T02TD2663A.2E:36b-8: spyod pa la gnyis su med pa'i rnal 'byor zhes pa ni lus dang ngag dang yid gsum gyi 'khor los spyod pa dang snying po byang chub kyi sku gnyis su med par sbyor ba ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:36b-9: de gnyis rang bzhin dbyer med pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2663A.2E:36b-10: las kyi rnam par smin pa bzhin //
T02TD2663A.2E:36b-11: zhes pa ni las kyi rnam par smin pa dang 'dra'o zhes pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:36b-12: rnam par smin pa nyid ma yin gyi de dang 'dra bar bstan pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:36b-14: sems dad pa'i sems can ni las kyi rnam par smin pa la brten te de nyid zad par 'gyur gyi bcom ldan 'das ni bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po'i rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu de zad par mi 'gyur ba ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:36b-15: snying po byang chub kyi sku de ni bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po'i rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu yin pas rnam par smin pa lta bu zhes bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:36b-16: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi yan lag dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:36b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku thams cad nas zhes pa nas /
T02TD2663A.2E:36b-18: snying po 'di la brtson par bya'o zhes pa'i bar gyis ni yi ge aa yi ge 'khor lo bskor ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi bdag por bzhag nas aa de'i yon tan brjod pa dang bcas par gsungs pa yin te /
T02TD2663A.2E:37a-0: de la bcom ldan 'das kyi yan lag dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku thams cad nas zhes pa @37a * //
T02TD2663A.2E:37a-1: ni yi ge aa de bzhin gshegs pa'i lus kyi 'khor lo sku thams cad nas byung ngo zhes pa'i don to //
T02TD2663A.2E:37a-2: 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa zhes pa la sogs pa de dag ni yi ge aa'i mthu chen po bstan pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:37a-3: de la 'jig rten pa zhes pa ni mu stegs kyi drang srong la sogs pa dang phyogs gcig stong par lta ba rnams so //
T02TD2663A.2E:37a-4: 'jig rten las 'das pa zhes pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bya ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:37a-5: nyan thos dag ni 'og nas 'byung bas na 'dir ma gtogs so //
T02TD2663A.2E:37a-6: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dag kyang rang gi rnam par grol ba phyogs gcig gi sgo stong pa la gnas pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:37a-7: de rnams kyang sngags sgrub pa'i 'jug pa dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:37a-8: bsam gtan gyi sgor 'jug pa rnam pa gnyis te de gnyi ga'i yang srog dang 'dra ba'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:37a-10: de dag thams cad kyang don dam par yang la la ni phyin ci ma log par yongs su grub pa'i stong pa /
T02TD2663A.2E:37a-11: la la ni phyogs tsam stong par lta ba ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:37a-12: spyir thams cad stong pa'i don la brten pas na yi ge aa'i don skyes pa'i chos nyid ni de dag thams cad kyi srog lta bu'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:37a-13: kun rdzob tu yang gang yig 'bru la brten pa'i chos thams cad aa las 'gyur bas na srog lta bu'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:37a-14: de la bsam gtan zhes pa ni rnal 'byor te sems pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:37a-15: bsam gtan du bya ba zhes pa ni bsam pa de'i 'bras bu gang yin pa ste de ni bsam gtan gyi sgo nas 'jug pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:37a-16: dngos grub sgrub pa ni rab dang 'bring dang tha ma la sogs pa ste de dag sgrub pa'i phyir 'jug pa de ni sngags sgrub pa'i sgor zhugs pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:37a-17: yi ge'i 'bru rnams kyang kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i sgo nas srog la sogs par 'gyur ba ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:37a-18: de la yi ge thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa zhes pa ni byang chub kyi sgo nas yi ge rnams aa la brten pa'i phyir 'tsho bar gyur pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:37a-19: aa zhes pa'i don ni ma skyes pa yin la /
T02TD2663A.2E:37a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i don kyang dgos pa thams cad dang bral ba ste ma skyes pa'i don to //
T02TD2663A.2E:37a-21: de bas na yi ge ka byang chub kyi sa bon gyi 'tsho ba yang aa la rag lus pa'i phyir srog ces bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:37b-0: de bzhin du yi ge lhag ma rnams kyang shes par @37b bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:37b-1: de la yi ge thams cad kyi srog tu gyur pa zhes pa ni spyod pa'i sgo nas yig 'bru rnams de la brten bas na de'i phyir srog ces bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:37b-2: skyabs su gyur pa zhes pa ni kun du sangs rgyas pa'i sgo nas yi ge rnams kyi rten yin pas na skyabs so //
T02TD2663A.2E:37b-3: rgyud ngo zhes pa ni mya ngan 'das pa'i sgo nas yi ge rnams byung ba'i don to //
T02TD2663A.2E:37b-4: rigs kyi bu dag 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa zhes pa ni sangs rgyas kyi sku'i 'khor lo thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs zhes pa'i don to //
T02TD2663A.2E:37b-5: byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams la /
T02TD2663A.2E:37b-6: sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pas so sor nye bar gnas pa yin te zhes pa ni yi ge aa de'i mthu chen po bstan pa ste sangs rgyas 'jig rten du 'byung ba'i tshe chos rnam pa gnyis bstan pa ni sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:37b-7: rnam pa gnyis ni bsam pa dag pa rnams la rtogs pa'i chos bstan pa dang bsam pa ma dag pa rnams la lung gi chos bstan pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:37b-8: de bzhin du yi ge aa yang chos de gnyig ston pa'i rgyu yin te /
T02TD2663A.2E:37b-9: de bas na sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pas so sor nye bar gnas pa yin no //
T02TD2663A.2E:37b-11: rtogs pa'i chos rnams kyang yi ge aa de'i don ma skyes pa las byung la /
T02TD2663A.2E:37b-12: lung gi chos rnams kyang yi ge'i 'bru'i sgo nas bshad pa yin te /
T02TD2663A.2E:37b-13: tshig thams cad yi ge aa las ma gyur pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2663A.2E:37b-14: sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par ji ltar shes she na /
T02TD2663A.2E:37b-15: chos thams cad ni aa zhes bya ba'i sgo nas 'jug go zhes gsungs te /
T02TD2663A.2E:37b-16: de yang ji ltar zhe na /
T02TD2663A.2E:37b-17: yi ge aa zhes bya bas rgyu byas pa las rtogs pa'i chos dang lung gi chos thams cad 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD2663A.2E:37b-18: de ltar yi ge aa zhes bya ba de sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed cing chos thams cad 'byung ba'i sgo yin pa de lta bas na sngags la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yi ge aa de de bzhin gshegs par blta ba la sogs pa bya ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:37b-19: de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthong bar 'dod bas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi snying po 'di la brtson par bya'o zhes sbyar te /
T02TD2663A.2E:38a-0: yi ge aa zhes bya ba'i don ni de bzhin @38a * //
T02TD2663A.2E:38a-1: gshegs pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir snying po byang chub nyid kyi snying po ste de ni don dam pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:38a-2: kun rdzob tu yang aa zhes bya ba'i yi ge'i 'bru de bsgoms na de'i mthus de bzhin gshegs pa grangs med pa 'char ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD2663A.2E:38a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa mchod par 'dod pas kyang yi ge 'di bsgom par bya la mchod pa yang sgrub pa'i mchod pa dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:38a-4: zad zing gi mchod pa rnam pa gnyis su rig par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:38a-5: de la sgrub pa'i mchod pa ni yi ge aa de nyid kyi don bsgoms par 'gyur la /
T02TD2663A.2E:38a-6: zang zing gi mchod pa ni yi ge aa de bsgoms pa'i mthu las nam mkha' gang ba'i mchod pa rgya chen po 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD2663A.2E:38a-7: byang chub kyi sems mngon sum du bya bar 'dod pa zhes pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po yan chad kyi sems la bya ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:38a-8: de mngon du bya bar 'dod pas yi ge aa'i don mngon par sgrub par byos shig ces pa'i don to //
T02TD2663A.2E:38a-10: byang chub kyi sems kyang ma skyes pa yin pas yi ge aa'i don ma skyes pa dang mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2663A.2E:38a-11: byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang 'grogs par 'dod pa zhes pa ni de ltar 'dod pas yi ge aa'i sgo sgoms shig ces 'don te /
T02TD2663A.2E:38a-12: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang ma skyes pa'i don la dmigs /
T02TD2663A.2E:38a-13: yi ge aa yang ma skyes pa'i don yin pas na spyod yul mthun pas lhan cig tu skye bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2663A.2E:38a-14: de yan chad ni bsam gtan gyi sgo nas bsgom pa dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:38a-15: aa nyid sngags kyi sgo sgrub ba la zhugs pa gnyis ka'i thun mong gi yon tan bstan pa yin la dngos grub mngon par 'dod pa zhes pa ni sngags kyi sgo nas zhugs pa'i grub pa rab 'bring rnam pa gsum mo //
T02TD2663A.2E:38a-16: de rnams ni yan lag gi tshig yin la /
T02TD2663A.2E:38a-17: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'dod pas 'di sgoms shig ces bya ba ni bsdus pa'i don yin no //
T02TD2663A.2E:38a-18: de nas dkyil 'khor bri ba'i cho ga rnam bo gsum bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2663A.2E:38a-19: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par mdzad kyis snying rje chen po'i snying po 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po 'di'i cho ga dgod pa dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:38a-20: lha'i gnas gtan la dbab pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2663A.2E:38b-0: de la snying rje chen po'i snying po 'byung ba zhes pa @38b ni lus kyi 'khor los byin gyis brlabs pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:38b-1: ngag gi dkyil 'khor la yang ming du gdags so //
T02TD2663A.2E:38b-3: dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum ka yang snying rje chen po'i nus pa dang rgyus dkyil 'khor 'byung ba'i phyir de skad ces bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:38b-4: lha'i gnas gtan la dbab pa zhes pa ni dbung mtha' dang mchog du bkod pa'i lha bzhugs pa'i gnas nges par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:38b-5: ting nge 'dzin rnam par sbrul pa zhes bya ba ni gang ting nge 'dzin du zhugs nas srung ba'i rig pa dang sngags la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:38b-6: gsang sngags spyod pa zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i tshe las su spyad pa rnams so //
T02TD2663A.2E:38b-7: bsam par bya ba ni dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa na slob mas byang chub sems bsam pa dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:38b-8: slob dpon rang gi ting nge 'dzin du gnas pa la sogs pa'i bye brag gsungs pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:38b-9: de dag so so'i bshad pa ni phyis 'chad par 'gyur ro//
T02TD2663A.2E:38b-10: de la dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po 'di'i cho ga dgod pa zhes don bshad pa'i phyir /
T02TD2663A.2E:38b-11: de la slob dpon gyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sgo aa zhes bya ba la gnas te zhes pa nas /
T02TD2663A.2E:38b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs snying po nyid kyi rang gi ngo bor byin gyis brlabs la zhes pa'i bar du gsungs te /
T02TD2663A.2E:38b-13: de la dkyil 'khor gyi thig bre ba'i tshe dkyil 'khor gyi snam bu re re la yang slob dpon kyi ting nge 'dzin re re gsungs te /
T02TD2663A.2E:38b-14: phyi rol gyi rim pa'i dkyil 'khor la byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la sogs pa pha rol tu phyin pa las skyes pa rnams bzhugs pas na thig bri ba'i slob dpon gyi ting nge 'dzin kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyu'i gnas kyi snying po yi ge aa la gnas te dkyil 'khor gyi srad bu bres shig ces gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2663A.2E:38b-15: de la dang po thig bri ba'i tshe dang por nam mkha'i thig bri bar gsungs pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal nas zhes pa nas byang phyogs su kha bltas nas srad du bres te zhes pa'i bar gyis so //
T02TD2663A.2E:38b-16: de nas sa'i dkyil 'khor gyi thig bri ba'i phyir //
T02TD2663A.2E:38b-17: nub phyogs su kha bltas la bsgyur te thig gdab po zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2663A.2E:39a-0: lhag ma rnams 'dir ma gsungs pa i snying rje chen po'i dkyil 'khor du @39a * //
T02TD2663A.2E:39a-1: thig bri ba zhib tu bshad zin pas 'dir yang lhag ma rnams de dang 'dra bar shes par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:39a-2: de nas snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi thig bri ba'i slob dpon gyi ting nge 'dzin bshad pa'i phyir /
T02TD2663A.2E:39a-3: de nas bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' lag na rdo rjer de'i phyag rgya'am /
T02TD2663A.2E:39a-4: yi ge ba zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs te nang du zhugs la snying po'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'i zhes gsungs te /
T02TD2663A.2E:39a-5: de'i slob dpon gyi ting nge 'dzin ni byang chub ba'i sa bon yi ge aas bskyed pa'i rdo rje sems dpar slob dpon bdag nyid byin gyis brlab pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:39a-6: rdo rje sems dpa' la yang las kyi rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa bzhin du 'dren pa yang yod de /
T02TD2663A.2E:39a-7: skabs 'dir ni gzhan la mi bya'i rdo rje sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:39a-8: de nas dkyil 'khor bar ma'i snam bu'i thig bri ba'i ting nge 'dzin bstan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2663A.2E:39a-9: de bzhin du dkyil 'khor gnyis pa la yang zhes pa nas /
T02TD2663A.2E:39a-10: snying po nyid kyi rang gi ngo bor byin gyis brlabs la zhes pa'i bar du gsungs te /
T02TD2663A.2E:39a-11: de la dkyil 'khor snam bu bar ma'i nang na longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang sprul ba'i sku gnyis bzhugs pas dkyil 'khor de'i thig bri ba'i tshe'ang sku de gnyis kyi rgyu'i ting nge 'dzin rnam pa bzhi slob dpon byin gyis brlabs te /
T02TD2663A.2E:39a-12: slob dpon gyis ting nge 'dzin de rnams dmigs nas bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
T02TD2663A.2E:39a-13: de nas gzod ma nas zhi ba ni byang chub pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:39a-14: gnyis su med pa'i rnal 'byor gyis gzugs ni spyod pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:39a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs ni kun du sangs rgyas pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:39a-16: snying po nyid kyi rang gi ngo bo ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:39a-17: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa mngon du byed cing zhes pa nas /
T02TD2663A.2E:39a-18: lha'i gnas bsham par bya'o zhes pa'i bar gyis de'i rgyud nas bshad pa gnas gtan la phab pa yin te /
T02TD2663A.2E:39a-20: de la snam bu gcig las kyang gsum du bgos te /
T02TD2663A.2E:39a-21: sum cha la 'khor sa bya zhing sum gnyis la lha'i gzugs bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
T02TD2663A.2E:39b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa mngon du byed cing srad du bres la zhes pas de ltar lha'i gnas dang 'khor sa dgod pa gya tshom du mi bya bar thig @39b btab ste bya bas de nyid kyi tshe na yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa stong pa nyid la dmigs par bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
T02TD2663A.2E:39b-1: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi tshon rtsi rnams byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2663A.2E:39b-2: de nas yang bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad du de'i phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs la zhes pa nas /
T02TD2663A.2E:39b-3: bdud sde sdang ba thams cad la //
T02TD2663A.2E:39b-4: rnam pa kun du bsdigs par byed //
T02TD2663A.2E:39b-5: ces pa'i bar du gsungs pa yin te /
T02TD2663A.2E:39b-6: de la bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad du de'i phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs la zhes pa ni tshon rnams byin gyis rlob pa'i tshe rdo rje'i phyag rgyas slob dpon nyid rnam par snang mdzad kyi skur byin gyis rlobs shig ces pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:39b-7: rdo rje ni ye shes kyi mtshan ma yin pas na ye shes lngas byin gyis brlabs pa'i don to //
T02TD2663A.2E:39b-8: tshon rnams byin gyis brlab pa yang kun rdzob dang don dam pa rnam pa gnyis te /
T02TD2663A.2E:39b-9: de la don dam par byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir /
T02TD2663A.2E:39b-10: chos kyi dbyings rgya chen por byin gyis brlabs te zhes gsungs pa yin te /
T02TD2663A.2E:39b-11: des ni mtshon sna tshogs chos gyi dbyings rgya chen po stong pa nyid du byin gyis brlab bo zhes bstan to //
T02TD2663A.2E:39b-12: thogs mar tshon rtsi dkar po blangs la zhes pas ni kun rdzob kyi sgo nas mtshon re re zhing yang lha re res byin gyis brlab par gsungs pa yin te /
T02TD2663A.2E:39b-13: de la tshon dkar po ni chos kyi dbyings kyis byin gyis brlab par gsungs pa la /
T02TD2663A.2E:39b-14: chos kyi dbyings de'i rang bzhin dang mthu bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2663A.2E:39b-15: 'di ni chos dbyings dag pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:39b-16: sems can khams ni rnam spyong ba //
T02TD2663A.2E:39b-17: 'di ni bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs //
T02TD2663A.2E:39b-18: nyes pa thams cad rnam par spangs //
T02TD2663A.2E:39b-20: chos kyi dbyings kyi don de lta bur bsams nas don de yi ger 'bar ba la sogs pa'i yon tan bshad pa de lta bus byin gyis brlab po //
T02TD2663A.2E:39b-21: de nas tshon dmar po byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir /
T02TD2663A.2E:39b-22: de nas tshon rtsi gnyis pa ni //
T02TD2663A.2E:39b-23: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2663A.2E:39b-24: yi ge aa'i sa bon gyis bskyed pa'i sangs rgyas thub dkas byin gyis brlab par gsungs so //
T02TD2663A.2E:39b-25: de nas tshon ser po la yi ge ka'i sa bon gyis bskyed pa'i /
T02TD2663A.2E:40a-0: sangs rgyas gser thub kyis byin gyis brlab @40a * //
T02TD2663A.2E:40a-2: de nas sngags pas tshon gsum pa //
T02TD2663A.2E:40a-3: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2663A.2E:40a-4: tshon ljang gu la snying po byang chub na bzhugs pa'i skus phyin gyis brlab pa'i phyir /
T02TD2663A.2E:40a-6: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
T02TD2663A.2E:40a-7: tshon ljang gu'i kha dog ni nor bu mrgad kyi kha dog lta bu'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:40a-8: tshon nag po khams gsum rnam par rgyal bas byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir /
T02TD2663A.2E:40a-9: de nas tshon rtsi nag po ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:40a-10: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
T02TD2663A.2E:40a-11: de la yi ge has bskyed pa'i khro bo'i gzugs de yang ci 'dra zhe na /
T02TD2663A.2E:40a-13: dus mtha'i me ltar mi bzad pa //
T02TD2663A.2E:40a-15: de yang tshon sna lnga rnams ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin du blta ste dkar po ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin no //
T02TD2663A.2E:40a-16: dmar po ni sangs rgyas thub dka'i rang bzhin te me long lta bu'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:40a-17: ser po ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so //
T02TD2663A.2E:40a-18: ljang gu ni so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes so //
T02TD2663A.2E:40a-19: nag po ni bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes so //
T02TD2663A.2E:40a-20: de dag gi rim pa bshad pa ni dang por chos kyi dbyings nyid du 'jug la /
T02TD2663A.2E:40a-21: stong pa 'ba' zhig tu dmigs par yang mi rung ste snying rje chen po'i dbang gis sems can la dmigs shing chags pa bskyed pa'i phyir de'i 'og tu tshon dmar po dgye'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:40a-22: sems can gyi don la zhugs pas rgyas par 'gyur te /
T02TD2663A.2E:40a-23: de bas na de'i 'og tu tshon ser po bri'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:40a-24: rgyas shing mthu dang ldan pas na las thams cad nus pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:40a-25: bdag dang gzhan gyi don nus pas de'i 'og tu tshon ljang gu bri'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:40a-26: 'jam pos 'dul ba la yang 'jam por ston /
T02TD2663A.2E:40a-27: ma rungs pa rnams la yang khro bor ston te thabs gzhan gyis mthu ma rungs pa rnams la thabs gzhan med na mthar drag shul gyis gdul ba'i phyir /
T02TD2663A.2E:40a-28: tha mar nag po gzhag ste khro bo la sogs ting nge 'dzin rnam par sprul pa zhes gong du smos pa de /
T02TD2663A.2E:40a-29: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de'i tshe ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'di man chad kyis 'chad de /
T02TD2663A.2E:40b-0: ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs zhes pa ni sngar ting nge 'dzin du zhugs pa las bzhengs nas rgyal ba'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug @40b pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:40b-1: mtha' yas pas rnam par rgyal ba zhes pa ni grangs med pa'i rgol ba rnams kyis mi tshugs pas na grangs med pa las rgyal ba zhes pa'i don to //
T02TD2663A.2E:40b-2: thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i stobs zhes bya ba'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul las 'byung ba 'di 'byung ngo zhes pa de la thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i stobs zhes pa ni kun rdzob dang don dam par te /
T02TD2663A.2E:40b-3: nyon mongs pa dang lha'i bu'i bdud la sogs pas mi tshugs zhes pa'i don to //
T02TD2663A.2E:40b-4: rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sbrul pa byin gyis rlob pa las /
T02TD2663A.2E:40b-5: yi ge'i 'khor lo rim par phye ba rgyas pa'o /
T02TD2663A.2E:40b-7: // / da ni phyag rgya'i le'u bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:40b-8: phyag rgya rnams bshad pa yang spyir 'dul ba'i 'gro ba zab cing rgya che ba rnams mos pa dang dmigs pa de rnam pa gnyis so //
T02TD2663A.2E:40b-9: de la zab cing rgya che ba la mos pa'i don to //
T02TD2663A.2E:40b-10: 'gro ba ni sngags kyi tshig rnams bshad pas sngags tshig de bdag gi sgra'i de khon nyid la dmigs shing byang chub kyi sems kyi bsgom pa sngon du 'gro ba'i lha'i gzugs su sbyor te lha'i gzugs sbyor ba de yang ting nge 'dzin dag pa dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:40b-11: rnam par rtog pa gzhan spangs pa dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:40b-12: lha'i gzugs su snang ba rdzogs par sbyor ro //
T02TD2663A.2E:40b-13: dmigs pa can gyis gdul ba'i 'gro ba ni sngags kyi sgra'i de kho na nyid la dmigs pa la sogs pa de dag mi nus te phyag rgya tsam bcings nas lha'i gzugs su sbyor bar byed pas na dmigs pa can gyis gdul ba'i 'gro ba de dag gi phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu'i yon tan rnams phyag rgya'i gzugs su byin gyis brlob bo //
T02TD2663A.2E:40b-14: de la ral gri dang rdo rje la sogs pa'i phyag rgya ni yid kyi yon tan no //
T02TD2663A.2E:40b-15: dung gi phyag rgya la sogs pa'i phyag rgya ni gsung gi yon tan no //
T02TD2663A.2E:40b-16: gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya la sogs pa'i phyag rgya ni sku'i yon tan no //
T02TD2663A.2E:40b-17: ji ltar rigs par sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:40b-18: phyag rgya'i le'u bshad pa de yang /
T02TD2663A.2E:40b-19: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'dus pa la gzigs nas /
T02TD2663A.2E:40b-20: byang chub sems dpa' gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
T02TD2663A.2E:41a-1: bdag po de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa rgyan du gyur pa /
T02TD2663A.2E:41a-2: chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa'i mtshan mar gyur pa'i phyag rgya rim par phye ba rgyas pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:41a-3: de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyan du gyur pa zhes pa'i gtsug tor dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:41a-4: spyan gyi phyag rgya la sogs pa sku'i rgyun du gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2663A.2E:41a-5: chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa'i mtshan mar gyur pa zhes pa ni de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes te de rtogs shing chud par byed pa'i mtshan mar ral gri dang rdo rje la sogs pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:41a-6: gang gis brgyan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams zhes pa nas /
T02TD2663A.2E:41a-7: de rnams kyang de dag gi ngag nyan par 'gyur zhes pa'i bar gyis ni phyag rgya de rnams bstan pa'i dgos pa bshad pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:41a-8: byang chub sems dpa' gang dag phyag rgya de rnams dang ldan na /
T02TD2663A.2E:41a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen po'i mtshan mas btab pas de dag la lha dang mi dang lha ma yin la sogs pa rnams kyis brdzi bar mi 'gyur zhing lha dang lha ma yin la sogs pa de rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi ngag nyan par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2663A.2E:41a-10: ji ltar 'jig rten na rgyal ba'i phyag rgya 'chang ba'i skyes bu de la 'jig rten pa'i mi rnams kyang brdzi bar mi byed la /
T02TD2663A.2E:41a-11: 'jig rten pa rnams de'i ngag kyang nyan par 'gyur ba dang 'dra ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:41a-12: mdor na phyag rgya 'di rnams bshad pas gdul ba'i 'gro ba rnams la mthong ba'i chos dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:41a-13: tshe phyi ma la phan par 'gyur bar bstan to //
T02TD2663A.2E:41a-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe stobs thogs pa med par gnas byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so zhes pa ni 'og nas byung ba'i phyag rgya de dag nyid stobs thogs pa med pa'i gnas zhes bya ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:41a-15: bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs nas phyag rgya de dag 'chad pa na ting nge 'dzin de'i ming stobs thogs pa med pa'i gnas byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:41a-16: de la thogs pa med pa zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyi sku mi zad pa la sogs pa'i rdo rje'i rgyan de dag ci la yang thogs pa med pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:41b-0: stobs zhes pa ni de ltar thogs pa med pa @41b nyid stobs su gyur pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:41b-1: gnas zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la bya la /
T02TD2663A.2E:41b-2: byin gyis rlob pa zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi sku mi zad pa la sogs pa rdo rje thogs pa med pa'i stobs su gyur pa de nyid phyag rgya'i ngo bo byin gyis rlob pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:41b-3: bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu rig sngags kyi rgyal mo thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i stobs can /
T02TD2663A.2E:41b-4: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i stobs can /
T02TD2663A.2E:41b-5: dam tshig la 'jug par byed pa stobs gsum dang ldan pa byung no zhes pa la sogs pa med pa'i stobs can zhes pa ni gong ma bzhin no //
T02TD2663A.2E:41b-6: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i stobs zhes pa ni thogs pa med pa'i stobs de nyid gang dang gang mi mnyam pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:41b-7: dam tshig la 'jug par byed pa zhes pa ni /
T02TD2663A.2E:41b-8: dam tshig gi don ni sngar bshad zin la /
T02TD2663A.2E:41b-9: dam tshig la 'jug pa ni sku mi zad pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor 'og ma'i 'gro ba rnams kyi lta ba'i sbyod yul du mi 'gyur bas de'i byin rlabs su gyur pa dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang sngags 'di bcings shing brjod pa na rang bzhin dkyil 'khor de mthong ba dang 'dra bas na 'jug pa zhes bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:41b-10: gnyis su na srung ba'i dam tshig rnams las nyams pas dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang sngags 'di byas na dkyil 'khor mthong ba dang 'dra ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:41b-11: de byas pa tsam gyis dam tshig las nyams nges so //
T02TD2663A.2E:41b-12: slar dam tshig tu zhugs par 'gyur bas na dam tshig la 'jug par byed pa zhes bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:41b-13: gsum du na dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i tshe dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang sngags 'di byas te 'jug pas na dam tshig la 'jug pa zhes bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:41b-14: gsang ba pa'i bdag po rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yang dag par ston par byed pa zhes pa ni rig pa ni brjod pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor mthong ba dang 'dra bas na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yang dag par ston par byed pa zhes bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:42a-0: gnyis su na gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor bris pa yang rig pa 'di brjod nas ston pa'am rig pa 'di brjod nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor de mthong bar 'gyur @42a * //
T02TD2663A.2E:42a-1: bas na sangs rgyas kyi sa dang yang dag par ston par byed pa zhes bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:42a-2: chos gsum gyi lam gyi mtshams las mi 'da' bar byed pa zhes pa la chos gsum ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang gsung dang rdo rje'i yid mi zad pa'i rgyan nam sku gsum ste de'i lam ni dam tshig srung ba'i bya ba la sogs pa ste lam de las mi 'da' ba'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:42a-3: sa dang pha rol tu phyin ba yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin te zhes pa ni dam tshig der zhugs nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa la sogs pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs rim gyis rdzogs par byed pa dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:42a-4: de'i mthus sa la rim gyis 'phar bar 'gyur bas na sa dang po pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:42a-5: sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig ni //
T02TD2663A.2E:42a-6: phyag rgya 'di la rab tu gnas //
T02TD2663A.2E:42a-7: zhes pa ni dam tshig gi don dam tshig srung ba las mi 'da' ba'am /
T02TD2663A.2E:42a-8: sku mi zad pa la sogs pa rtog par byed pa'am /
T02TD2663A.2E:42a-9: sku de dag yongs su thob par byed pa de dag phyag rgya 'di'i sgo nas mtshon cing rtog par byed pas na /
T02TD2663A.2E:42a-10: phyag rgya 'di la rab tu gnas //
T02TD2663A.2E:42a-12: rgya 'di phyag rgya chen po ste //
T02TD2663A.2E:42a-13: chos dbyings rnam par sbyong ba'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:42a-14: zhes pa ni chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid phyag rgya 'dis mtshon cing rtog par 'gyur bas chos kyi dbyings sbyong ba zhes bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:42a-15: phyag rgya dpal dang ldan pa ni //
T02TD2663A.2E:42a-16: chos kyi 'khor lo zhes su grags //
T02TD2663A.2E:42a-17: 'jig rten mgon po skyob rnams kyis //
T02TD2663A.2E:42a-19: chos kyi dbyings su byin brlabs nas //
T02TD2663A.2E:42a-20: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i phyir //
T02TD2663A.2E:42a-21: rdo rje sems dpar byin brlabs te //
T02TD2663A.2E:42a-22: dpal dang ldan pa zhes pa ni //
T02TD2663A.2E:42a-23: rdo rje sems dpa' nyid la dpal rdo rje sems dpa' de lung gi chos dang rtogs pa'i chos rnams kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yin la /
T02TD2663A.2E:42a-24: phyag rgya rdo rje sems dpar bsgyur na byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi mgon po rnams kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed do zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:42a-25: sangs rgyas skyob pa thams cad kyi //
T02TD2663A.2E:42a-26: phyag rgya chen po ral gri'i rgya //
T02TD2663A.2E:42a-27: 'dis ni lhan cig skyes pa yi //
T02TD2663A.2E:42a-28: 'jig tshogs lta ba gcod par byed //
T02TD2663A.2E:42b-0: ces pa ni ral @42b gri'i phyag rgya ni chos dang gang zag la bdag med par rtog pa'i ye shes kyi mtshan mar gyur pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:42b-1: ye shes 'dis ni lhan cig skyes pa'i bdag tu lta ba rnams gcod do zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:42b-2: phyag rgya dpal dang ldan pa 'di //
T02TD2663A.2E:42b-3: chos kyi dung zhes rnam par bsgrags //
T02TD2663A.2E:42b-5: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams //
T02TD2663A.2E:42b-7: rdul dang bral ba'i chos 'chad do //
T02TD2663A.2E:42b-8: zhes pa ni dung gi phyag rgya ste sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi mtshan mar gyur pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:42b-9: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas kyi gsung 'dis rdul dang bral ba'i chos rnams mya ngan las 'das pa zhi ba thob par byed pa 'chad do zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:42b-11: sangs rgyas skyob pa thams cad kyi //
T02TD2663A.2E:42b-12: mi shigs rdo rje'i gdan yin te //
T02TD2663A.2E:42b-14: rgyal bsras bcas thams cad ni //
T02TD2663A.2E:42b-16: zhes pa ni padma'i phyag rgya de /
T02TD2663A.2E:42b-17: sangs rgyas rnams kyi gdan yin te //
T02TD2663A.2E:42b-18: mgon po sangs rgyas rnams gang du byang chub pa na yang gdan 'di la bzhugs te byang chub la /
T02TD2663A.2E:42b-19: sangs rgyas kyi sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang padmo 'di las skyes zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:42b-20: phyag rgya chen po rdo rje'i rgya //
T02TD2663A.2E:42b-21: mi shes grong khyer 'jig pa ste //
T02TD2663A.2E:42b-22: sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes 'di //
T02TD2663A.2E:42b-23: nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs te bstan //
T02TD2663A.2E:42b-24: zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi de ma thag pa'i lam gyi ye shes de rdo rje'i phyag rgyar byin gyis brlabs pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:42b-25: mi shes pa'i grong khyer 'jig pa ni ye shes des sems las byung ba'i 'khor dang bcas pa'i ma rig pa rnams 'joms zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:42b-26: gtsug tor phyag rgya chen po ste //
T02TD2663A.2E:42b-27: gtsug tor zhes ni bsgrags pa yin //
T02TD2663A.2E:42b-28: 'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang //
T02TD2663A.2E:42b-29: rgyal ba mchog tu 'gyur ba yin //
T02TD2663A.2E:42b-30: zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gtsug tor de phyag rgyar byin gyis brlabs pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:42b-31: 'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang //
T02TD2663A.2E:42b-32: rgyal ba mchog tu 'gyur ba yin //
T02TD2663A.2E:43a-0: zhes pa ni phyag rgya la ni mang po bsdus pa las lha'i gzugs su 'gyur la gcig pus lha'i gzugs su gyur pa ni gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya ste 'di gcig pus @43a * //
T02TD2663A.2E:43a-1: bcings pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi skur bsgyur du rung zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:43a-2: rgyal ba dam pas phyag rgya 'di //
T02TD2663A.2E:43a-3: mdzod spu zhes ni rab tu bsgrags //
T02TD2663A.2E:43a-4: 'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis su //
T02TD2663A.2E:43a-5: rgyal ba mchog tu 'gyur ba yin //
T02TD2663A.2E:43a-6: zhes pa bcom ldan 'das kyi skyes bu chen po'i mtshan smin mtshams nas mdzod spu zhes bya ba spu'i nyag ma gcig gis brkyang na ni khams gsum thams cad du yang khyab par 'gyur la bskyil na de nyid du zad pa de phyag rgya 'dir byin gyis brlabs pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:43a-7: 'di 'ba' zhig bcings pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi skur bsgyur du rung zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:43a-8: lhung bzed kyi phyag rgya ni tshigs su bcad pa nyid kyis gsal bar gsungs so //
T02TD2663A.2E:43a-9: sems can kun la mi 'jigs pa //
T02TD2663A.2E:43a-10: de yis rab tu sbyin par 'gyur //
T02TD2663A.2E:43a-11: gang gi rgya chen de bcings na //
T02TD2663A.2E:43a-12: mi 'jigs phyag rgya zhes bsgrags so //
T02TD2663A.2E:43a-13: zhes pa ni mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:43a-14: bdag gam sems can rnams bgegs la sogs pas skrag cing 'jigs par gyur na phyag rgya bcings te bstan pas de las thar bar 'gyur zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:43a-15: 'di ni dam pa byin rgya zhes //
T02TD2663A.2E:43a-16: 'jig rten mgon po rnams kyi sgra //
T02TD2663A.2E:43a-17: 'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis su //
T02TD2663A.2E:43a-18: rgyal mchog dam pa stsol bar byed //
T02TD2663A.2E:43a-19: ces pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can rnams la mchog sbyin pa'i phyag rgya ste nam grub pa la sogs pa'i mchog 'dod na mchog sbyin pa'i phyag rgya 'di bcings nas mnod do //
T02TD2663A.2E:43a-20: phyag rgya chen po rgya chen 'dis //
T02TD2663A.2E:43a-21: sangs rgyas skyob pa thams cad kyis //
T02TD2663A.2E:43a-22: bdud ni rnam par bsdigs zhes bya //
T02TD2663A.2E:43a-23: phung byed thams cad 'jigs par byed //
T02TD2663A.2E:43a-24: 'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis su //
T02TD2663A.2E:43a-25: bdud sde shin tu mi bzad dang //
T02TD2663A.2E:43a-26: gegs dang log 'dren gzhan dag kyang //
T02TD2663A.2E:43a-27: the tshom med par rab tu 'byer //
T02TD2663A.2E:43a-28: zhes pa ni gegs rnam par bskrad pa'i phyag rgya ste bcings pa tsam gyis gegs la sogs pa thams cad rnam par skrag nas so sor 'byer bar 'gyur te /
T02TD2663A.2E:43a-29: de ltar gegs rnams so sor byer na gegs med pas ji ltar bsams pa'i don grub par 'gyur bas na re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:43a-30: 'di ni sangs rgyas mgon rnams gyi //
T02TD2663A.2E:43a-31: thugs rje las byung sbyan yin te//
T02TD2663A.2E:43b-0: @43b mig gi steng du mkhas pas bzhag / de las sangs rgyas spyan du 'gyur //
T02TD2663A.2E:43b-1: zhes pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi snying rje chen po'i dbang gis shes rab kyi spyan sems can thams cad la gzigs pa ni snying rje las byung ba'i spyan zhes bya ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:43b-2: spyan de phyag rgya 'dir byin gyis brlabs bas na phyag rgya 'di bcings te mig tu gzhag na bdag sangs rgyas kyi skur bsgyur ba'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi spyan du 'gyur ro //
T02TD2663A.2E:43b-3: 'di ni zhags pa mchog ces grags //
T02TD2663A.2E:43b-4: sdang ba thams cad 'jig par byed //
T02TD2663A.2E:43b-5: sngags pas 'di bcings de yi tshe //
T02TD2663A.2E:43b-6: rtag tu sdang ba bcings par 'gyur //
T02TD2663A.2E:43b-7: zhes pa ni 'phags pa'i lam gyi yan lag brgyad kyi rang bzhin gyi ye shes sems can thams cad 'don par byed pa zhags pa'i phyag rgyar byin gyis brlabs te /
T02TD2663A.2E:43b-8: zhags pa'i phyag rgya 'di bcing pas bgegs la sogs pa'i gnod pa rnams 'ching ba'i las byed do zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:43b-9: sangs rgyas skyob pa thams cad kyi //
T02TD2663A.2E:43b-10: lcags kyu zhes ni 'di bshad de //
T02TD2663A.2E:43b-11: byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che //
T02TD2663A.2E:43b-12: sa bcu dag la gnas pa dang //
T02TD2663A.2E:43b-13: sdang bar sems pa gzhan dag kyang //
T02TD2663A.2E:43b-14: sangs rgyas rab tu 'gugs par byed //
T02TD2663A.2E:43b-15: ces pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyu dang 'bras bu'i spyod pa rnams las rgyu'i tshe na bsdu ba rnam pa bzhis sems can rnams sdud cing 'dren pa dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:43b-16: 'bras bu'i tshe sku mi zad pa la sogs pa'i rdo rje'i rgyan gyis sems can rnams sdud cing 'dren pa'i spyod pa de dag nyid lcags kyus phyag rgyar byin gyis brlabs pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:43b-17: lcags kyus kyang bgegs la sogs pa gnod par byed pa rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu la gnas pa yang ste thams cad 'dren par byed de byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu la gnas pa yang 'gugs na gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:43b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa'i lte ba'i phyag rgya la phyag rgya de nyid las zhes pa ni lcags kyu'i phyag rgyal snyegs te lcags kyu'i phyag rgya las srin lag gnyis bsgreng par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:43b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya ni mngon par byang chub pa dang sbyar ro //
T02TD2663A.2E:43b-20: lcags kyu'i phyag rgya ni spyod pa dang spyar ro //
T02TD2663A.2E:44a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyi phyag rgya dang stobs bcu'i phyag @44a * //
T02TD2663A.2E:44a-1: rgya ni kun du sangs rgyas pa dang sbyar ro //
T02TD2663A.2E:44a-2: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtog par byed pa'i phyag rgya ni mya ngan las 'das pa dang sbyar ro //
T02TD2663A.2E:44a-5: zhes pa nam kun du sangs rgyas pa dang sbyar ro //
T02TD2663A.2E:44a-6: nam:sa manta badzr'a n'am zhes pa ni byang chub dang sbyor ro //
T02TD2663A.2E:44a-7: nam:sarba ta th'a ga te bhya: zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang sbyar ro //
T02TD2663A.2E:44a-8: de la sngags dang phyag rgya rnams bstan pa yang sbyir bstan pa dang so sor bstan pa de /
T02TD2663A.2E:44a-9: de la so sor bstan pa yang rnam pa gnyis te dngos su bstan pa dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:44a-11: de la dngos su bstan pa ni gong du ming smos pa rnams so //
T02TD2663A.2E:44a-12: gzhan du snyeg pa ni de lta bu la sogs pa zhes pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:44a-14: sbyir bstan pa ni gsang ba pa'i bdag po'o na kyang ji tsam du yan lag bskyod pa de dag kun phyag rgya rgyas par rig par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:44a-15: ji tsam du lce bskyod pa de dag kun kyang gsang sngags bstan pa rig par bya'o zhes pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:44a-16: de yang ji lta bur gnas nas she na //
T02TD2663A.2E:44a-17: byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa'i yid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa la gnas te dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o zhes pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:44a-18: nam sngags pa byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa'i yid dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:44a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa la gnas par gyur na ji tsam du yan lag la sogs pa bskyod pa de tsam du phyag rgyar 'gyur ji tsam du lce bskyod pa de tsam du sngags spyod par 'gyur ro zhes pa dang sbyar te /
T02TD2663A.2E:44a-20: byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa'i yid ces pa ni stong pa nyid la dmigs pa'i sems dang ldan pa zhes bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:44a-21: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa la gnas zhes pa ni kun rdzob dang don dam pa ram pa gnyis te //
T02TD2663A.2E:44a-22: kun rdzob tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa la gnas pa ni lha'i gzugs su sbyar ba'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:44a-23: don dam pa ni stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi lhar sbyar ba ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:44a-24: de ltar yang byang chub kyi sems dang ldan zhing kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i mtshan nyid lha'i gzugs su sbyar ba ma yin par sngags dang phyag rgya bya ba'am /
T02TD2663A.2E:44b-0: dkyil 'khor bris na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis srung bar mi 'gyur ro zhes dngos su @44b gsungs so //
T02TD2663A.2E:44b-1: rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sbrul pa byin gyis rlob pa las /
T02TD2663A.2E:44b-2: phyag rgya'i rim par phye ba rgyas pa'o /
T02TD2663A.2E:44b-4: // / da ni sngags kyi le'u bshad pa la sogs pas sngags kyi tshig dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:44b-5: yi ge'i 'bru las ting nge 'dzin gyi sgor 'gyur ba la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:44b-6: yi ge ka la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gnyis rnams aa la sogs pa bcu drug dang ldan par 'gyur ba bstan te /
T02TD2663A.2E:44b-7: de la yi ge ka la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po rnams ni yi ge aa dang mi smra ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:44b-8: de thams cad kyang aa dang ldan par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:44b-9: de yang gsang ba pa'i bdag po thams cad du 'jug pa'i chos kyi sgo chos kyi rnam grangs nyon cig ces pa la sogs pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:44b-10: thams cad du 'jug pa'i sgo zhes pa ni aa dang ldan pa'i yi ge rnams sngags la sbyar ba dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:44b-11: ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa thams cad du khyab par 'jug pa'i sgo'o zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:44b-12: de bas na gsang ba'i bdag po de la byang chub sems dpas aa zhes bya ba la gnas te /
T02TD2663A.2E:44b-13: dgos pa thams cad bsgrub par bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2663A.2E:44b-14: dang po aa dang sa dang bste gsum smos pa ni rigs gsum smos pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:44b-15: de dang por yi ge aa tha mal bar smos nas ka la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gnyis pa ma smos pa ni ka la sogs pa rnam pa thams cad kyang tha ma la pa'i rang bzhin du shes par bya ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:44b-16: de dag thams cad byang chub kyi rang bzhin du bstan pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:44b-17: yi ge aa 'dren pa thog mar smos nas ka la sogs pa thams cad kyang ring por smos pa rnams ni de dag thams cad sbyod pa'i rang bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:44b-18: yi ge aam thog mar smos nas kam zhes pa la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gnyis smos pa thams cad kyang aam dang ldan pas kun du sangs rgyas pa'i rang bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:44b-19: yi ge aa cho ga gnyis dang ldan pa thog mar smos na ka la sogs pa thams cad aa tsheg gnyis dang ldan pa ni thams cad kyang mya ngan las 'das pa'i rang bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:45a-0: ka la sogs pa'i yi ge sum cu rtsa gnyis po de rnams ai la sogs pa dang ldan pa na yang ting nge 'dzin de dag nyid kyi sgo ston pa'i @45a * //
T02TD2663A.2E:45a-1: rang bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:45a-2: de la ri r'i dang li l'i gnyis ma smos pa ni gong du yi ge ra dang ai la sogs par ldan pa ri r'i zhes pa'i khongs su 'dus la /
T02TD2663A.2E:45a-3: la dang ai la sogs par ldan pa li l'i zhes pa de'i khongs su 'dus par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:45a-4: gsang ba pa'i bdag po de ltar na 'di ni yi ge'i tshul la mkhas pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs te zhes pa nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po ngas ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab 'byams gang dag na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad du 'dug pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mi 'chad pa mthong ngo zhes pa'i bar ni bshad pa'i yi ge rnams kyi rjes su bsngags pa bshad pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:45a-5: rang bzhin phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:45a-6: lus phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:45a-7: byin rlabs phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:45a-8: mthu phun sum tshogs pa bstan pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:45a-9: de lha rang bzhin phun sum tshogs pa ni yi ge'i rang bzhin rnams so sor bstan pa ste yi ge'i tshul la mkhas pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs te zhes pa'i tshig gis so //
T02TD2663A.2E:45a-10: lus phun sum tshogs pa ni gsang sngags kyi tshul la mkhas pa'i cho ga zhes pa'i tshig go //
T02TD2663A.2E:45a-11: byin rlabs phun sum tshogs pa ni nam yi ge'i sngags rnams kyi sgrar brjod dam /
T02TD2663A.2E:45a-13: lha'i gzugs su sbyor bas na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis byin gyis rlob pa dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:45a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin du brlabs pa zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshig gis so //
T02TD2663A.2E:45a-15: mthu phun sum tshogs pa ni 'das pa dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:45a-17: ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang bshad ces pa nas /
T02TD2663A.2E:45a-18: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mi chad pa ma mthong ngo zhes pa'i bar gyi tshig gis so //
T02TD2663A.2E:45a-19: byin gyi rlabs phun sum tshogs pa la las rnam pa bzhi ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:45a-20: sngags rnams su sbyor ba dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:45a-21: lha'i gzugs su sbyor ba dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:45a-22: ting nge 'dzin du sbyor ba dang spyod pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:45a-23: de la sngags rnams su sbyor ba ni yi ge'i 'bru de rnams las sngags kyi tshig gi tshul du sbyar ba ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:45a-24: gsang sngags kyi tshul la mkhas pa'i cho ga zhes pa'i tshig snga ma nyid kyis so //
T02TD2663A.2E:45b-0: lha'i gzugs su sbyor ba ni yi ge rnams @45b gang rung pa las lha'i gzugs su sbyor ba ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:45b-1: lha yongs su gzung ba'i cho ga zhes pa'i tshig gis so //
T02TD2663A.2E:45b-2: ting nge 'dzin du sbyor ba ni yi ge 'bru de rnams la stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin chos kyi skur sbyor ba ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:45b-3: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshul la mkhas pa zhes pa'i tshig gis so //
T02TD2663A.2E:45b-4: sbyod pa zhi ba dang rgyas pa la sogs pa'i las dang rab 'bring la sogs pa'i dngos grub bsgrub pa'i spyod pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:45b-5: byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i rol mo ste zhes pa'i tshig gis so //
T02TD2663A.2E:45b-6: ka dang tsa dang ta dang ta dang pa rnams thog ma dang tha ma dang dbus dang ldan zhing ting nge 'dzin gyi tshogs 'jug pas byang chub dang sbyod pa dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:45b-7: mya ngan las 'das pa dang bcas par thob par byed do zhes pa ni yi ge ka la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po de rnams dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:45b-8: dang po'i aa a'a zhes pa gnyis dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:45b-9: tha ma'i aam aa zhes pa gnyis dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:45b-10: dbus kyi ai la sogs pa rnams dang ldan par sbyar na byang chub dang sbyod pa dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:45b-11: kun du sangs rgyas pa dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:45b-12: mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo ston pa'i rang bzhin yin pas de rnams dang ldan par ting nge 'dzin du sbyar na byang chub la sogs pa thob par 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:45b-13: de bzhin du de bas na gsang sngags kyi cho ga dang po la sogs pa'i tha snyad dang lan par gyur pa de dag nyid thog ma dang tha ma dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:45b-14: dbus dang lhan cig tu gyur par shes par bya ste zhes pa dang po la sogs pa'i zhes pa ni thog ma'i aa a'a dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:45b-15: tha ma'i aam aa dang: dbus kyi ai la sogs pa dang ldan bar ka la sogs pa rnams brjod na byang chub la sogs pa 'thob pa 'ba' zhig ma yin gyi sngags kyi tshig rnams su yang 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:45b-16: gsang sngags kyi tshig re re la ji ltar 'dod par sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:45b-17: blo yis rnam par rtog na ni //
T02TD2663A.2E:45b-18: de dag bla ma'i gnas mchog ster //
T02TD2663A.2E:45b-19: zhes pa ni mkhas pa ji ltar 'dod pas sngags kyi gtso bor de'i tshig re re dang sbyor cig de dang nges par 'tshang rgya zhing bla na med pa'i gnas mchog sbyin par byed do zhes 'don te /
T02TD2663A.2E:45b-20: gong du smos pa'i tshul la mkhas pas ting nge 'dzin gang 'dod pa'am /
T02TD2663A.2E:46a-0: @46a * // rang gi lha gang yin par sbyar pa la sogs pa la yi ge de rnams las gang yang rung ba ji ltar 'dod ba'i 'bru gcig la sbyar na yang ji ltar bsam pa'i don 'grub par byed do zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:46a-1: de ltar 'di ni 'khor lo gcig ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:46a-2: 'khor lo bzhin du yongs su 'khor ba ni yi ge'i 'khor la zhes pa ni yi ge aa gcig po las ka la sogs pa du ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin 'khor lo lta bur 'khor ba'o zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:46a-3: sngags pas yi ge'i 'khor lo ste shes na rtag tu ji ltar bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad 'khor lo bskor ba bzhin du rnam par mnges par 'gyur ro zhes pa ni sngags pas gong du smos pa'i yi ge 'khor lo de shes na bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad bzhin du las dang sbyod pa thams cad sbyod nus par 'gyur ro zhes pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:46a-4: mdzes pa zhes pa ni sbyod pa'i tshig tu shes par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:46a-5: rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sbrul pa byin gyis rlob pa las /
T02TD2663A.2E:46a-6: thams cad du 'jug pa'i sgo chos kyi yi ge'i tshul rim par phye ba rgyas pa'o /
T02TD2663A.2E:46a-8: // / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku mi zad pa dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:46a-10: thugs mi zad pa'i rdo rje'i rgyan de rnams dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs pa la /
T02TD2663A.2E:46a-11: sku mi zad pa byin gyis brlabs pa'i dkyil 'khor snying rje chen po'i snying po 'byung ba dang gsung mi zad pa'i byin gyi rlabs yi ge 'khor lo bskor ba'i dkyil 'khor dag ni gong du bshad zin to //
T02TD2663A.2E:46a-12: da ni thugs mi zad ba'i sku'i dkyil 'khor chos kyi sku byin gyi rlabs su 'gyur ba de 'chang la de'i zhar la sngar dkyil 'khor gnyis pa bshad pa'i cho ga'i dkyil 'khor kyi mtshan nyid dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:46a-13: slob ma'i mtshan nyid la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:46a-14: dkyil 'khor gyi yo byad du bcas pa sngar rgyas par bshad cing ma rdzogs pa rnams dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:46a-15: sbyi na sreg gi chog la sogs pa yang 'di nyid du rgyas par 'chad do //
T02TD2663A.2E:46a-16: de la chos kyi sku ni mtshan mas bstan pa las 'das te /
T02TD2663A.2E:46a-17: dngos po med pas bstan du mi mngon yang yon tan dang rjes su mthun pa las bstan par bya ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:46b-0: chos kyi sku'i yon tan ni phyin ci ma log pa dang mi 'gyur bar @46b yongs su grub pa'i rang bzhin rnam par rtog pas thams cad spangs pa dang nyon mongs pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:46b-1: bya ba thams cad byed nus pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD2663A.2E:46b-2: de dang rjes su mthun pa'i sgo nas de ston pa nas dang chu dang me dang rlung rnams kyi dkyil 'khor du byin gyis brlabs bas ston te /
T02TD2663A.2E:46b-3: sa ni brtan zhing mi 'gyur bar yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid rdo rje dang 'dra bas dbang chen rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du byin gyis brlabs te bstan to //
T02TD2663A.2E:46b-4: chu ni thams cad 'khru bas dag par byed pa'i rang bzhin yin pas rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs pa'i rang bzhin ni chu'i dkyil 'khor du byin gyis brlabs nas bstan to //
T02TD2663A.2E:46b-5: me'i rang bzhin sreg par byed pa dang yi ger chos thams cad rdul dang bral bar ston pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa thams cad rdul dang rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid ni me'i dkyil 'khor du byin gyis brlabs te bstan to //
T02TD2663A.2E:46b-6: rlung ni kun du 'gro zhing thams cad byed par sngar bshad zin te /
T02TD2663A.2E:46b-7: bya ba thams cad byed nus pa'i rang bzhin ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor du byin gyis brlabs te bstan to //
T02TD2663A.2E:46b-8: de ltar chos kyi sku'i byin rlabs su gyur pa gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor de dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:46b-9: dkyil 'khor gsum char gyi cho ga rdzogs par bshad pa'i phyir /
T02TD2663A.2E:46b-10: bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
T02TD2663A.2E:46b-11: de yang ci zhig byas nas zhugs she na /
T02TD2663A.2E:46b-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan gyis thams cad la gzigs nas zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2663A.2E:46b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis gzigs nas zhes pa'i don to //
T02TD2663A.2E:46b-14: chos kyi dbyings kyi mdzod kyi mthu rlabs te de bzhin gshegs pa'i mnyam pa nyid bkod pa'i snying po can zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so zhes pa la chos kyi dbyings ni de bzhin nyid de /
T02TD2663A.2E:46b-15: de las sku mi zad pa la sogs pa'i rdo rje'i rgyan rnams kyis mtshan nyid 'byung ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i mnyam pa nyid bkod pa zhes bya ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:46b-16: de dag chos kyi dbyings de las 'byung bas na /
T02TD2663A.2E:46b-17: chos kyi dbyings de nyid mdzod ces bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:46b-18: mthu rlabs ni rnam par 'phrul pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:47a-0: de las byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rnam pa sna tshogs su spyod pa zhes @47a * //
T02TD2663A.2E:47a-2: mnyam pa nyid ces pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'byung ba de dag nyid tshogs dang chos kyi sku dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:47a-3: sems can gyi don byed bar mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02TD2663A.2E:47a-4: bkod ba zhes bya ba ni mang po'i tshig go //
T02TD2663A.2E:47a-5: snying po can zhes bya ba ni 'byung ba ni 'byung ba'i gnas ting nge 'dzin de nyid la bya ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:47a-6: ting nge 'dzin der zhugs na de lta bu dag 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD2663A.2E:47a-7: ting nge 'dzin du zhugs nas kyang ji lta bu zhig ston zhe na /
T02TD2663A.2E:47a-8: chos kyi dbyings mi zad pa bkod pa bstan pa dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:47a-9: gsang sngags kyi sbyad pa mngon par bsgrub pa 'di nyid kyi sems can gyi khams ma lus pa gdon par thugs dam bcas pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2663A.2E:47a-10: chos kyi dbyings zhes pa ni skabs 'dir sems can gyi khams la bya ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:47a-11: de las mngon par 'byung ba bstan pa yang las dang tshe dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:47a-12: rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu zhes pa la sogs pa 'og nas 'byung ba'i tshig rnams kyis 'chad do //
T02TD2663A.2E:47a-13: sngags kyi spyad pa mngon par bsgrub pa 'di nyid kyi sems can gyi khams ma lus pa gdon par thugs dam bcas pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir zhes pa ni snying rje chen po 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:47a-14: yi ge 'khor lo bskor ba'i dkyil 'khor bstan du zin kyang gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ma bstan na tshig lnga la sogs pa dang ldan par yang mi 'gyur la /
T02TD2663A.2E:47a-15: de'i zhar la snga ma'i cho ga lhag ma rnams kyang rdzogs par bshad par bya ba ma bstan na /
T02TD2663A.2E:47a-16: sngags par rdzogs bar mi 'gyur te de bas na de dag thams cad rdzogs par bstan na sems can gyi khams ma lus pa gdon par thugs dam bcas par rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2663A.2E:47a-17: de nas de nyid kyi tshe sems can gyi khams ma lus pa zhes bya ba 'byung bar byed pa'i sgo'i bu ga thams cad nas bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin las dang tshe dang rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu za ba dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:47a-24: nges pa'i tshig brjod pa sems can thams cad so so so sor yang dag par mgu bar byed pa dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:47b-0: chos kyi dbyings kyi rnam par bskyed pa'i sku rnams byung bar @47b gyur to zhes pa ni de ltar bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku sems can thams cad dang rjes su mthun pa las dang tshe dang rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu za ba dang zar 'jug pa la sogs pa smon pa 'byung zhes pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:47b-1: las kyi rnam par smin pa dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:47b-2: tshe'i 'bras bu za bar ston pa ni las legs nyes ci sbyad pa'i 'bras bu bde ba dang sdug bsngal rnams la rang rang spyod par snang ba'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:47b-3: zar 'jug pa ni rgyal po dang sems can dmyal ba'i srung ma la sogs pa lta bu'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:47b-4: de dag gi dbang du byas nas gzhan dag pa de ba dang sdug bsngal la spyod du 'bab pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:47b-5: de dag nyid kyi bye brag gzugs dang kha dog dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas gsungs te /
T02TD2663A.2E:47b-6: sems can rnams kyi gzugs dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:47b-7: kha dog dang bsam pa la sogs ba rjes su mthun par chos 'chad pa'i sku rnams byung ngo zhes sbyar te /
T02TD2663A.2E:47b-8: de bas na sems can thams cad so so so sor yang dag par mgu bar byed pa zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2663A.2E:47b-9: sems can gyi khams ma lus pa nges par 'byung bar byed pa'i sgo zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i bsbu'i khung bu de sems can gyi khams ma lus pa nges par 'byung bar byed pa las dang tshe dang rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu zab dang zar 'jug par snang ba'i sku rnams 'byung ba'i sgo yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2663A.2E:47b-10: byung nas kyang nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams rnams su sgra dbyangs gcig gis chos kyi dbyings khyab par rnam par rig par byed pa de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di sgrogs par gyur to zhes pa ni 'og nas byung ba'i tshigs su bcad pa de sgrogs pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:47b-11: de yang thams cad tshig tu sgra sgrogs pas na sems can gyi khams thams cad du thos shing rtogs par byed pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:47b-12: chos kyi dbyings ni 'dir sems can gyi khams su shes par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:48a-0: de skad du bsgrags pa'i tshigs su bcad pa de chos kyi dbyings la dmigs nas ston pa'i tshig de tshigs su bcad pa bstan pa de la @48a * //
T02TD2663A.2E:48a-1: rtogs shing goms par byas na /
T02TD2663A.2E:48a-2: de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur bas na /
T02TD2663A.2E:48a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:48a-4: gsungs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa ni /
T02TD2663A.2E:48a-5: chos kyi mtshan nyid gang las ni //
T02TD2663A.2E:48a-7: lam 'di khyed kyis bsgom par gyis //
T02TD2663A.2E:48a-9: chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid gang las 'byung ba ni sangs rgyas dang nyan thos la sogs pa ming gis smos pa rnams te /
T02TD2663A.2E:48a-10: mdor na chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyi mtshan nyid chos kyi dbyings de bzhin nyid las sangs rgyas dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:48a-13: kun du sangs rgyas pa dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:48a-16: chos rnams skye zhing gnas pa dag 'byung ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:48a-17: ji ltar 'byung ba shes rab dang thabs su ldan pas lam 'di khyed kyis rtag tu sgom par gyis shig ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:48a-18: de yang rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bshad pa yin no zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:48a-19: brtags pa'i rim pa zhes pa ni kun rdzob tu zhes pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:48a-20: mdor na chos rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings mtshan nyid ci 'dra ba dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:48a-21: de'i dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku las sbrul pa'i sku la sogs pa 'byung ba dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:48a-22: de la dmigs nas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas la sogs pa sangs rgyas la thug pa'i bar du ji ltar 'grub par 'gyur ba'i lam de khyed kyis shes par gyis shig ces pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:48a-23: de ltar bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin der zhugs nas 'jig rten pa dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:48a-24: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos gnyis bstan te /
T02TD2663A.2E:48a-27: rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu za ba dang zar 'jug pa la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:48a-28: 'jig rten las 'das pa ni tshigs su bcad pa 'di nyid do //
T02TD2663A.2E:48a-29: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chos kyi dbyings las byung ba de dag gis chos kyi dbyings thams cad rang gi sku rnam par rig par byed pa sbrul pa'i sprin gyis yongs su bkang nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs kyi dbang tsam gyis ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas /
T02TD2663A.2E:48a-30: sangs rgyas 'byung ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa byin gyi rlabs te /
T02TD2663A.2E:48b-0: rang rang gi @48b chos kyi dbyings kyi gnas su zhugs par gyur to zhes pa ni gang du bcom ldan 'das kyi ba sbu'i bu ga thams cad nas chos kyi dbyings kyi bskyed pa'i byung ba de dag bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs kyi dbang tsam gyis sangs rgyas kyi sku mngon par byang chub pa dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:48b-1: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la sogs pa sems can gyi khams thams cad du rang gi sku rnam par rig byed pa sprul pa mang pos khyab par byas nas thugs gyi dbang tsam gyis rang rang gi chos kyi dbyings kyi gnas su zhugs par bstan to //
T02TD2663A.2E:48b-2: thugs kyi dbang tsam gyis zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ni sgrub pa po lta bur blta la /
T02TD2663A.2E:48b-3: sprul pa'i sku rnams 'byung ba ni bsgrub pa'i lha rnams lta bur blta'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:48b-4: chos kyi dbyings kyi bskyed pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni chos kyi dbyings kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sbrul pa'i sku rnams 'byung ngo zhes pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:48b-5: des kyang chos kyi dbyings kyi byin rlabs dang sgrub pa po sems kyi dbang tsam gyis rang gi lha'i sku'i gzugs su snang bar 'gyur ro zhes ma 'ongs pa'i gdul ba'i 'gro ba rnams la bstan pa yin no //
T02TD2663A.2E:48b-6: rang rang gi chos kyi dbyings kyi gnas su zhugs par gyur to zhes pa ni slar ba sbu'i bu ga de rnams su zhugs pa la mi bya'o /
T02TD2663A.2E:48b-7: gang du byung ba'i gnas de dag nyid du chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi snang bar gyur pa la bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:48b-8: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi rang gi sku las byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams kyis sems can gyi khams thams cad du khyab par byas te /
T02TD2663A.2E:48b-9: slar mi snang bar gyur pa bstan nas /
T02TD2663A.2E:48b-10: de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas thugs mi zad pa'i rdo rje'i byin gyi rlabs gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:48b-11: dkyil 'khor gsum gyi cho ga'i lhag ma rnams bshad par gsungs pa yin /
T02TD2663A.2E:48b-12: gsang ba zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor 'dis yid kyi rang bzhin chos kyi sku byin gyis brlabs pa yin pa'i phyir /
T02TD2663A.2E:48b-13: yid kyi rang bzhin chos kyi sku de dngos su bstan pa'i rang bzhin yin te phra bas na gsang ba zhes bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:49a-0: gnyis su na sku dang gsung gi rang bzhin @49a * //
T02TD2663A.2E:49a-1: lang phyag rgya'i rang bzhin du bsgyur bas sku dang gsung du mi mngon pa la'ang bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:49a-2: lha rnams kyi gnas pa zhes pa ni dbang chen la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor de dag lha rnams byin gyis rlob pa'i gnas yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2663A.2E:49a-3: sa bon dang bcas pas mtshan pa zhes pa ni dbang chen la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor so so'i sa bon aa dang ba la sogs pas mtshan pa zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:49a-4: dang por sngags pas dkyil 'khor de //
T02TD2663A.2E:49a-5: rang gi lus la bgo bya ste //
T02TD2663A.2E:49a-6: zhes pa ni tshon 'gyed pa la sogs pa'i sngon rol du sngags pa sngar bshad pa'i rnal 'byor gyi stan la gnas nas /
T02TD2663A.2E:49a-7: snga ma bzhin du dbang chen la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor lus la rim pa bzhin du gzhag go zhes pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:49a-9: rkang pa rnams ni chu so la //
T02TD2663A.2E:49a-10: thug gi bar du sa yig bsam //
T02TD2663A.2E:49a-11: de nas 'og tu snying ga'i bar //
T02TD2663A.2E:49a-12: sngom brtson can gyis chu yig bsam //
T02TD2663A.2E:49a-13: chu yi yan chad me yi ste //
T02TD2663A.2E:49a-14: me yi yan chad rlung yin no //
T02TD2663A.2E:49a-16: chu yi yan chad me yi ste //
T02TD2663A.2E:49a-17: zhes pas snying ga yan chad mer bsam pa ni gsal na /
T02TD2663A.2E:49a-18: me yi yan chad rlung yin no //
T02TD2663A.2E:49a-19: zhes pa la gang yan rlung du bsam pa'i mtshams gsal bar ma smos kyang snying po las smin mtshams su yi ge h'um bsam par gsungs pas na smin mtshams yan chad rlung gi dkyil 'khor du bsams par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:49a-20: bsams nas de nas mkhas pa yis //
T02TD2663A.2E:49a-21: sa la gzugs brnyan gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:49a-22: zhes pa ni sngags pas de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin byas nas sa la gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:49a-23: de nas phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi sa la zhugs nas zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs mi zad pa'i rdo rje'i rgyan la zhugs zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:49a-24: chos mnyam pa nyid la bltas te zhes pa ni don dam par yang chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mnyam la kun rdzob tu yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la sogs pa sems can gyi khams ji snyed pa dang mnyam pa la bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:49b-0: ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo rnams la brtags nas zhes pa ni ma 'ongs pa'i 'gro ba rnams gyi don du rig sngags gyi @49b rgyal po the tshom thams cad gcod par byed pa 'di smras so zhes pa ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sngags pas dkyil 'khor bri ba'i sngon rol du sngags kyi rgyal po 'di bsnyen par byas nas dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:49b-1: sngags 'di'i don la 'jug pa dang 'dis bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD2663A.2E:49b-2: gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes gsang sngags kyi rgyal po 'di smras ma thag tu zhes pa nas /
T02TD2663A.2E:49b-3: 'jig rten khams kun zhugs pa yis //
T02TD2663A.2E:49b-4: rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams dbang du 'gyur //
T02TD2663A.2E:49b-5: zhes pa'i bar phyag na rdo rjes gsang sngags kyi rgyal po 'di smras pa'i rjes su bsngags pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2663A.2E:49b-6: de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin //
T02TD2663A.2E:49b-9: zhes pa'i bar gyis sngar bcom ldan 'das kyis /
T02TD2663A.2E:49b-10: yid gnyis som nyid dbral ba //
T02TD2663A.2E:49b-11: rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis rab bshad pa'i //
T02TD2663A.2E:49b-12: lam 'di khyed kyis bsgom par gyis //
T02TD2663A.2E:49b-13: zhes gdams pa nyid gyi don phyag na rdo rjes ji ltar rtogs pa bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:49b-14: rtog pa de yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlab pa'i rtog pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2663A.2E:49b-15: de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin //
T02TD2663A.2E:49b-16: bsam pa mchog rab mgu gyur pa //
T02TD2663A.2E:49b-17: zhes pa la sogs pa gsol pa yin te /
T02TD2663A.2E:49b-18: bdag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dgongs pa zhes pa ni phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phyag g-yas pa brkyang ste spyi bor gzhag ste byin gyis brlabs pa shes pa yin no zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:49b-19: chos 'di rnams ni mtshan nyid med //
T02TD2663A.2E:49b-20: ces pa ni phung po dang khams dang skye mched la sogs pa'i chos rnams rang bzhin gyis stong pas na mtshan ma dang bral pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:49b-21: ngo bo nyid med ces pa ni bdag dang bdag gi ba'i rang bzhin du yod pa ma yin te zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:49b-22: gnas med pa ni pha rol po rnams kyi cha shas can la sogs pa kun gyis gnas su brtags pa de yod pa ma yin zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:49b-23: las dang tshe las rnam grol te //
T02TD2663A.2E:49b-24: zhes pa ni chos rnams kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rang bzhin med ces pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:49b-25: de ltar rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rang bzhin med pas mtshan nyid med pa la sogs pa'i tshig gong ma rnams dang sbyar ro //
T02TD2663A.2E:50a-0: @50a * // rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'dra bar spyod //
T02TD2663A.2E:50a-1: ces pa ni chos thams cad gang du yang dngos po yod pa ma yin te /
T02TD2663A.2E:50a-2: 'du shes tsam du zad do zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:50a-3: thugs rje mnga' ni mdzad pa yis //
T02TD2663A.2E:50a-4: mgon po rnams kyi thabs kyis ni //
T02TD2663A.2E:50a-5: rnam par bskul nas chos rnams kyi //
T02TD2663A.2E:50a-7: zhes pa ni chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid 'di 'dra ba de bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs rje chen po'i thabs kyi sgo nas byin gyis brlabs pas bdag gis rtogs so zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:50a-8: de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes ched du brjod pa'i tshigs su bcad pa de smras nas zhes pa nas /
T02TD2663A.2E:50a-9: sngags pa rnams kyis nam zhig na //
T02TD2663A.2E:50a-10: las dang tshe las rnam grol 'gyur //
T02TD2663A.2E:50a-11: zhes pa'i bar gyis gsang ba pa'i dkyil 'khor bri ba dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:50a-12: dkyil 'khor gsum char gyis cho ga'i lhag ma rnams bris pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:50a-13: slob dpon gyi ting nge 'dzin dang dbang bskur ba'i chog rnams ma gtogs par dkyil 'khor gsum char chog gzhan thams cad mthun par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:50a-14: snying rje chen po'i snying po 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di'i the tshom bcad pa'i phyir zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor gsum char yang snying rje chen po las 'byung bas na gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor la snying rje chen po'i snying po las 'byung ba zhes bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:50a-15: the tshom bcad pa ni 'og nas 'byung ba'i don rnams bshad na cho ga rnams ma rdzogs pas ma 'ongs pa'i 'gro ba rnams the tshom du 'gyur te /
T02TD2663A.2E:50a-16: de bas na de dag gi the tshom bcad pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo rnams la brtags nas zhes pa la sogs pas dngos su gsungs so //
T02TD2663A.2E:50a-17: dri ba 'di rnams kyi don ni 'og nas lan zhib tu 'byung bas na de dang sbyar te bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:50a-18: de'i 'og tu bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag na rdo rje la bshad pa'i skabs la babs pas /
T02TD2663A.2E:50a-19: de nas kun mkhyen rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02TD2663A.2E:50a-20: zhes pa la sogs gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2663A.2E:50a-21: phyag na rdo rjes dris pa rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis sbyir rnam pa gsum du bsdu ba mdzad nas /
T02TD2663A.2E:50a-22: snying rje chen po'i rtsa las byung //
T02TD2663A.2E:50a-23: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams dgod pas //
T02TD2663A.2E:50a-24: lha rnams kyi ni gnas nges pa//
T02TD2663A.2E:50b-0: @50b theg pa chen po'i go 'phang mchog / rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi rab gsang ba //
T02TD2663A.2E:50b-1: dpa' bo cher byung khyod kyis gang //
T02TD2663A.2E:50b-2: yongs su dris pa de legs so //
T02TD2663A.2E:50b-3: lag na rdo rje stobs po che //
T02TD2663A.2E:50b-4: mdor ni bsdus nas bshad par bya //
T02TD2663A.2E:50b-5: zhes gsungs pa yin te de la /
T02TD2663A.2E:50b-6: lha rnams kyi ni gnas nges pa //
T02TD2663A.2E:50b-7: zhes bya bas ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha'i bye brag dang lha de rnams kyi kha dog la sogs pa dris pa dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:50b-8: lha rnams kyi gnas dbang chen la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor du brtag pa de dag mdor bsdus te gsungs pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:50b-9: theg pa chen po'i go 'phang mchog / ces pa ni /
T02TD2663A.2E:50b-10: sngags pa byang chub mchog sems dpa' //
T02TD2663A.2E:50b-11: thams cad mkhyen pa ji ltar 'gyur //
T02TD2663A.2E:50b-12: ji ltar bden pa mthong bar 'gyur //
T02TD2663A.2E:50b-13: zhes dris pa de dag bsdus te gsungs pa yin te /
T02TD2663A.2E:50b-14: gnas de dag ni byang chub tu gzhol ba'i go 'phang yin pas /
T02TD2663A.2E:50b-15: theg pa chen po'i go 'phang mchog /
T02TD2663A.2E:50b-17: gzhan rnams kyang theg pa chen po'i gnas yin mod kyi /
T02TD2663A.2E:50b-18: gzhan las 'di nye zhing gtso bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2663A.2E:50b-19: de gnyis las gzhan pa slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid dang tshon 'gyed pa la sogs pa ji srid dris pa de dag thams cad ni gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams dgod bzhes pa'i nang du bsdus par rig par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:50b-20: de la skabs 'dir gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor gsum char gyi cho ga sbyir bris pa'i don de dag nyid dam tshig can ma yin pa la mi bstan pas gsang ba zhes bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:50b-21: gzhan ni gong du smos pa bzhin no //
T02TD2663A.2E:50b-22: cher 'byung zhes pa na gong du dris pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu sha stag yin pas dris pa'i don de dag la chen po 'byung ba'i rgyu zhes bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:50b-23: snying rje chen po'i rtsa las byung //
T02TD2663A.2E:50b-24: zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor de dag snying rje chen po las byung bas de'i yo byad dris pa'i don de dag kyang /
T02TD2663A.2E:50b-25: snying rje chen po'i rtsa las byung //
T02TD2663A.2E:50b-27: rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi rab gsang ba //
T02TD2663A.2E:50b-28: zhes pa ni theg pa chen po'i go 'phang mchog la sogs pa de dag snod ma yin pa'i sems can rnams la mi bshad pas rab tu gsang ba zhes bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:50b-29: dkyil 'khor gyi ni sngon rol du //
T02TD2663A.2E:51a-2: zhes pa'i bar ni dkyil 'khor bri ba'i sngon rol slob dpon gyis bdag dang slob ma srung ba la sogs pa'i las bya ba'i sngags rnams la yun du bsnyen pa byas nas so so'i las la sbyar ro zhes gsang ba'i rgyud la sogs pa las byung ste de'i phyir dkyil 'khor bri ba'i sngon rol du rig pa'i rgyal po'i bzlas pa bya ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:51a-3: mtshan ma byung gi bar du bzlas na de dag thams cad bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2663A.2E:51a-4: 'di'i mtshan ma yang dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i rnam par gnas pa na sngags pa'i rmi lam du sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dkyil 'khor 'dri ba'i las la sogs mthong na zhes pa dang sbyar ro //
T02TD2663A.2E:51a-5: yan lag bcu gnyis tshig byung ba //
T02TD2663A.2E:51a-6: zhes pa ni yi ge 'bru yan lag bcu gnyis sngags kyi tshig tu gyur pa la yang bya ba la gnyis su na yig 'bru bcu gnyis las don dam pa'i mtshan nyid rtogs par 'gyur ba la yang bya ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:51a-7: yan lag ces pa ni yi ge'i 'bru'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:51a-8: p'a da zhes pa ni rtogs pa la bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:51a-9: rig sngags rgyal po stobs po che //
T02TD2663A.2E:51a-10: zhes pa ni don dam par stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ston par byed la /
T02TD2663A.2E:51a-11: kun rdzob tu yang sprul pa la sogs pa byed pas na mthu che ba'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:51a-12: go rims bzhin du bzlas brjod bya //
T02TD2663A.2E:51a-13: zhes pa ni rtsa sngags dang snying po dang nye ba'i snying po rim pa bzhin du bzlas zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:51a-14: rang gi ting 'dzin la gnas te //
T02TD2663A.2E:51a-15: zhes pa ni slob dpon rang gi ting nge 'dzin rigs gsum gyi snying po gnas gsum du gzhag pa dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:51a-16: dpa' bo chen po'i snying po gnas lngar dgod pa dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:51a-17: yan lag thams cad du yi ge dgod pa yang rung ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas bzlas par bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:51a-18: so so'i las rnams 'dod pa yis //
T02TD2663A.2E:51a-19: tshul zhes pas ni ci rigs par //
T02TD2663A.2E:51a-20: zhes pa ni de lta bu'i rim pas sngon du bsnyen pa byas nas bdag dang gnas dang slob ma srung ba la sogs pa'i sngags rnams ji ltar rigs par sbyor ro zhes pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:51a-21: rig pa'i rgyal po 'di sngon du bsnyen pa bya ba yang dkyil 'khor gsum ga dang 'brel par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:51a-22: gsang sngags phyag rgya rtogs shes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:51b-0: @51b rjes su gnang zhing dbang yang bskur //
T02TD2663A.2E:51b-1: zhes pa'i bar gyis slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid dang bye brag bshad pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:51b-2: de yang spyi'i mtshan nyid dang bye brag bshad pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:51b-3: de la spyi'i mtshan nyid ni yid byang chub kyi sems la zhugs pa zhes pa dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:51b-4: theg pa gsum gyi khyad par shes pa la sogs pas sngar bshad zin to //
T02TD2663A.2E:51b-5: 'dir ni zab cing rgya che ba la mos pa dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:51b-6: dmigs pa can gyi bye brag bshad pa ste //
T02TD2663A.2E:51b-8: zab dang mi zab bye brag las //
T02TD2663A.2E:51b-9: de yi mtshan nyid shes par bya //
T02TD2663A.2E:51b-10: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02TD2663A.2E:51b-11: gsang sngags phyag rgya rtogs shes pa'i //
T02TD2663A.2E:51b-12: zhes pa ni slob dpon nyid kyi spyi'i mtshan nyid de /
T02TD2663A.2E:51b-13: phyag rgya dang sngags rnams gzhung las ji skad bshad pa bzhin shes par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:51b-14: zab mo rgya cher shes par bya //
T02TD2663A.2E:51b-16: mthong ba'i chos ni rnam par spangs //
T02TD2663A.2E:51b-17: zhes pa'i bar ni zab cing rgya che ba la mos pa'i slob dpon gyi bye brag ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:51b-18: zab mo ni stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa la mos pas de'i sems kyi rgyud sus kyang rig par mi nus te dpag par dka' zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:51b-19: rgya che ba ni don dam par chos thams cad stong pa nyid nam mkha'i rang bzhin lta bur rtogs la kun rdzob tu yang sgyu ma dang smig rgyu lta bur shes nas tshod pa la sogs pa rgya chen po la sbyor pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:51b-20: lus can rnams ni yid mi rton //
T02TD2663A.2E:51b-21: zhes pa ni lus can rnams dang spyod lam mi mthun pas gcig la gcig yid mi rton pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:51b-22: sangs rgyas rnams kyi sras mchog ste //
T02TD2663A.2E:51b-23: zhes pa ni sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i phyir te //
T02TD2663A.2E:51b-24: 'jig rten na yang pa'i spyod pa dang mi 'gal bar spyod pa ni be'u mchog ces bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:51b-25: mthong ba'i chos ni rnam par spangs //
T02TD2663A.2E:51b-26: zhes pa ni 'jig rten kun rdzob kyi chos rnams la ma chags pa zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:51b-27: gnyis pa mthong ba'i chos rnams kyis //
T02TD2663A.2E:51b-29: rjes su gnang zhing dbang yang bskur /
T02TD2663A.2E:51b-30: zhes pa'i bar slob dpon dmigs pa can gyi bye brag ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:51b-32: myos par 'gyur ba dmigs pa can //
T02TD2663A.2E:52a-0: zhes pa ni thos pa dang bsam pa'i shes rab kyis sngags kyi rgyud la sogs pa thos shing bsam pa'i shes rab kyis stong pa'i rang @52a * //
T02TD2663A.2E:52a-1: bzhin du mos su zin kyang bsgom pa'i shes rab kyis goms par nus pas phyi rol gyi spyod pa rnams la mos par 'gyur te /
T02TD2663A.2E:52a-2: des 'jig rten pa'i dkyil 'khor tshon la sogs pas bri bar bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang bskur zhing lung stsal to zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:52a-3: 'jig rten pa'i dkyil 'khor ni tshon la sogs pas bris nas 'jig rten pa rnams kyi lta ba'i spyod yul du gyur pas 'jig rten pa'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya'i mu stegs pa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la ni mi bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:52a-4: de bas na slob dpon dmigs pa can gyis phyi rol gyi tshon la sogs pas dkyil 'khor bri bar dbang bskur gyi //
T02TD2663A.2E:52a-5: sems dbang du ma gyur pas yid kyi dkyil 'khor bri bar ni dbang mi bskur ro //
T02TD2663A.2E:52a-6: zab cing rgya che ba la mos pa'i slob dpon de ni phyi'i dkyil 'khor dang nang gi dkyil 'khor gnyis ka bri bar dang bskur te /
T02TD2663A.2E:52a-7: phyi rol gyi spyod pa rnams la ma chags shing sems dbang du gyur pas nang gi dkyil 'khor bri bar dbang bskur te /
T02TD2663A.2E:52a-8: slob ma rnams kyi yid dang sbyar ba'i phyir phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor yang bri bar gsungs so //
T02TD2663A.2E:52a-9: dus dang dus min bye brag las //
T02TD2663A.2E:52a-11: slob ma de ni rgyal ba'i mchog / ces bya ba'i bar gyis slob ma'i bye brag bshad de /
T02TD2663A.2E:52a-12: dus dang dus min bye brag las //
T02TD2663A.2E:52a-13: zhes pa las sbyir slob ma rnam pa bzhi las slob ma kha cig sngags kyi rgyud la sogs pa thos shin shes la /
T02TD2663A.2E:52a-14: byang chub kyi sems kyang bsgoms pa ni dkyil 'khor du bcug pa nyid kyi tshe na sgrub par dbang bskur la slob dpon dmigs pa can gyis mtshan nyid dang ldan na byang chub sems dang mi ldan yang de nyid kyi tshe na slob dpon du dbang bskur bar bya ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:52a-16: gcig ni de yi mod la bsgrub //
T02TD2663A.2E:52a-18: gzhan ni sngags kyi rgyud la sogs pa thos shing shes kyang byang chub kyi sems ma bsgoms na sgrub par dbang bskur du mi rung ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:52a-19: dkyil 'khor der bcug nas byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa'i thabs bstan te /
T02TD2663A.2E:52a-20: byang chub kyi sems goms par gyur pa ni phyis bsgrub par bya ba ni dus gnyis par bsgrub pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:52b-0: de bzhin du slob dpon dbang bskur ba don du gnyer na yang sngags kyi rgyud la sogs pa mi shes na der dbang mi bskur bar sngags @52b kyi rgyud la sogs pa rdzogs par slob tu bcug ste slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa na slob dpon du dbang bskur ba yang dus gnyis par bsgrub pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:52b-1: de la kha cig snga nas kyang rgyud la sogs pa mi shes shing byang chub kyi sems kyang ma bsgoms phyis kyang mi slob la bsgom par mi 'gyur ba ni dkyil 'khor du gzung ba tsam las dus gnyis par yang slob dpon du sgrub par dbang mi bskur bar ni gnyis kar min zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:52b-2: mtshan nyid thams cad rdzogs pa yis //
T02TD2663A.2E:52b-3: slob ma de ni rgyal ba'i mchog / cas pa ni /
T02TD2663A.2E:52b-4: rgyud la sogs pa yang rdzogs par shes //
T02TD2663A.2E:52b-5: byang chub sems kyang tshul bzhin du bsgom pa zhig gis bsod nams spel ba'i phyir dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa de yang slob ma'i grangs su yang gtogs te /
T02TD2663A.2E:52b-6: de ni dbang la sogs pa bskur bas //
T02TD2663A.2E:52b-7: 'dir dbang la sogs pa gdod bskur mi dgos te /
T02TD2663A.2E:52b-9: mtshan nyid thams cad rdzogs pa yis //
T02TD2663A.2E:52b-11: sa ni dang por shes bya ba //
T02TD2663A.2E:52b-13: de bas rtog pa rnam spangs nas //
T02TD2663A.2E:52b-14: sa kun rnam par sbyang bar bya //
T02TD2663A.2E:52b-15: zhes pa'i bar gyis sa sbyang ba bshad de /
T02TD2663A.2E:52b-16: phyi nang gi rnam pa gnyis las //
T02TD2663A.2E:52b-17: phyi'i sa sbyang ba ni sngar bshad zin to //
T02TD2663A.2E:52b-18: 'dir nang gi sa sbyang ba bshad de //
T02TD2663A.2E:52b-19: sems kyi sar ni bshad pa yin //
T02TD2663A.2E:52b-21: spyad pa sngar ni bstan pa ste //
T02TD2663A.2E:52b-22: zhes pa ni sngar byang chub kyi sems ni rang gi sems yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa zhes nang /
T02TD2663A.2E:52b-25: dbyibs su 'am zhes pa nas rnam pa thams cad kyi bar du yongs su btsal kyang mi dmigs pa yin te zhes pa la sogs pa'i bar du bshad pa de'i tshul du ting nge 'dzin dag pa dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:52b-26: rnam pa thams cad spangs pa dang //
T02TD2663A.2E:52b-27: rnam par rtog pa dang bral bas na //
T02TD2663A.2E:52b-28: sems kyi dri ma dag pa ste //
T02TD2663A.2E:52b-29: de ltar dag par byas nas phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor ram /
T02TD2663A.2E:52b-30: nang gi dkyil 'khor gang yang rung ba bri bar bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:52b-31: de yis de ni yongs su spangs //
T02TD2663A.2E:52b-32: zhes pa ni sngar byang chub kyi sems sbyang bar bshad par des sems kyi sbyang bar bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:52b-33: nam zhi nye pa dang bral nas //
T02TD2663A.2E:53a-0: zhes pa ni ji ltar phyi rol gyi sa'i @53a * //
T02TD2663A.2E:53a-1: nyes par rus pa dang rdo ba la sogs pa med pa bzhin du 'dir yang rnam par rtog pa la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:53a-2: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams dang bral na bgegs la sogs pa sa mi 'jigs zhes bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:53a-4: de tshe de ni dag pa ste //
T02TD2663A.2E:53a-5: nyes pa thams cad rnam par spangs //
T02TD2663A.2E:53a-6: mngon par byang chub mthong bas na //
T02TD2663A.2E:53a-7: de ltar de ni bstan zhes bya //
T02TD2663A.2E:53a-9: de las gzhan dus spyod pa //
T02TD2663A.2E:53a-11: byang chub sems kyis spyang bya //
T02TD2663A.2E:53a-12: zhes pa'i bar gyis phyi rol gyi sa rnams sa sbyangs pa na yang byang chub kyi sems dang mi ldan par rtog pa la gnas te /
T02TD2663A.2E:53a-14: de las gzhan du zhes pa gang gi nang du spyang ba las gzhan pa ste phyi'i sa la bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:53a-15: sngags pa rtog pa la gnas nas su //
T02TD2663A.2E:53a-16: zhes pa ni phung po dang khams dang skye mched la sogs pa'i dngos po yod par rtog ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:53a-17: sbyang bar bya ba'i sa dang //
T02TD2663A.2E:53a-18: rus pa la sogs pa'i nyes pa yang dngos po yod par rtog cing sa de spyod na de byang chub kyi sems dang mi ldan pas de dag par 'gyur ba ma yin zhes pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:53a-19: de bas rtog pa rnam spangs nas //
T02TD2663A.2E:53a-20: sa kun rnam par sbyang bar bya //
T02TD2663A.2E:53a-21: da yis dkyil 'khor rnams kyi ni //
T02TD2663A.2E:53a-22: cho ga rgyas par gang bstan pa //
T02TD2663A.2E:53a-23: de dag thog mar bstan pa ni //
T02TD2663A.2E:53a-24: zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin te /
T02TD2663A.2E:53a-25: byang chub kyi sems sngon du bsgom pa yang slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid mang pa las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul la rtag tu mkhas pa theg pa gsum gyi khyad par shes pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa'i phyir /
T02TD2663A.2E:53a-26: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul la mkhas pa ni stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la mkhas par mngon par sngon du byang chub kyi sems bsgom par rig par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:53a-27: theg pa gsum gyi khyad par shes pas kyang stong pa nyid la mkhas par mngon te /
T02TD2663A.2E:53a-28: gang zag dang chos la bdag med pa'i khyad par la mkhas pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2663A.2E:53a-29: dkyil 'khor gyi las 'di rnams thams cad kyang bya ba byas pa'i slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid de lta bu dang ldan pas sa sbyang bar bya bas na rtog pa 'ba' zhig la mi gnas gyi /
T02TD2663A.2E:53b-0: @53b byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pas 'jig rten pa rnams kyi sems dang sbyar ba'i phyir /
T02TD2663A.2E:53b-1: phyi rol gyi sa rnams sbyang ba rgya cher bshad pa'i bcom ldan 'das gyi dgongs pa de /
T02TD2663A.2E:53b-2: rmongs pa rnams kyis mi shes te //
T02TD2663A.2E:53b-3: gang gis de lta bu'i rtog pa ma spangs pa de ni sangs rgyas dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyur mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD2663A.2E:53b-6: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs la /
T02TD2663A.2E:53b-7: slob ma rnams la nan tan du //
