T02TD2663A.2E:53b-8: byang chub sems kyi sbyang ba ste //
T02TD2663A.2E:53b-9: de yang smon pa byang chub kyi sems dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:53b-10: 'jug pa byang chub kyi sems sbyang ba gnyis 'jug pa byang chub kyi sems sngar bsgoms na de sbyangs pa yin pas phyis dkyil 'khor du 'jug kar smon pa byang chub kyi sems sbyin par bya ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:53b-11: gnyis po de dag sa sbyang ba'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:53b-12: de ste sngar 'jug pa'i byang chub kyi sems goms par ma byas na dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i tshe smon pa byang chub kyi sems sbyin la /
T02TD2663A.2E:53b-13: phyis 'ug pa byang chub kyi sems bsgom du gzhug ste de ni slob ma rnams kyi byang chub kyi sems kyi sbyong ba'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:53b-14: srung ba mi g-yo mgon po 'am //
T02TD2663A.2E:53b-15: khams gsum rnam par rgyal bas bya //
T02TD2663A.2E:53b-16: zhes pa ni slob ma rnams kyi srung ba gsungs pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:53b-17: slob ma rnams thog ma nang du 'ong ba'i tshe srung ba dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:53b-18: lhag par gnas pa'i tshe srung ba la sogs pa thams cad gnyis po 'di dag gang yang rung bas srung ngo zhes so //
T02TD2663A.2E:53b-19: slob ma nam zhig dmigs pa yis //
T02TD2663A.2E:53b-20: nam yang g-yos par mi 'gyur ba //
T02TD2663A.2E:53b-21: de tshe dri med na nam mkha' bzhin //
T02TD2663A.2E:53b-22: yang dag par ni dag par 'gyur //
T02TD2663A.2E:53b-23: zhes pas ni slob ma dag pa'i mtshan nyid gsungs te /
T02TD2663A.2E:53b-24: de yang nam slob ma de rnal 'byor la gnas pa'i tshe ting nge 'dzin dag pa dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:53b-25: rnam par rtog pa spangs pa dang //
T02TD2663A.2E:53b-26: rnam pa dang bral ba ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:53b-27: dge ba dang mi dge ba gnyis ka la dmigs pas mi g-yos pa dang rnal 'byor las langs nas kyang mchod pa la sogs pa'i dge ba ni spyod kyi 'dod chags la sogs pa'i yul gyi dmigs pas mi g-yo bar 'gyur na de dag pa'i mtshan nyid do zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:53b-28: de tshe dri med nam mkha' bzhin //
T02TD2663A.2E:54a-0: zhes pa ni ji ltar nam mkha' gang gis @54a * //
T02TD2663A.2E:54a-1: kyang ma bsdus pas rang bzhin gyis dang ba dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:54a-2: glo bur gyi sbrin la sogs pas chod na yang nam mkha' de rang bzhin dag pa las nyams par mi 'gyur ba bzhin du /
T02TD2663A.2E:54a-3: 'di yang ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i tshe dge ba dang mi dge ba la sogs pa'i dri ma gnyis med pa dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:54a-4: ting nge 'dzin las langs pa'i tshe mchod pa la sogs pa'i spyod pa byed kyang sgyu ma la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du shes bzhin du byed de /
T02TD2663A.2E:54a-5: dngos po yod par rtog pa'i dri mas mi gos pa'i phyir //
T02TD2663A.2E:54a-6: sa byin rlab pa dang po ni //
T02TD2663A.2E:54a-7: rdzogs sang rgyas kyis bya bar bshad //
T02TD2663A.2E:54a-8: gnyis pa sems kyi dbang gis te //
T02TD2663A.2E:54a-11: sngar snying rje chen pos sa yongs su gzung ba'i tshe dkyil 'khor gyis sbyang ba der sangs rgyas lnga bsam pa la sogs pa gsungs pa de nyid 'dir gleng nas rim pa bzhin du bshad pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:54a-12: dkyil 'khor gyi sa de dang por sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams der bsams nas byin gyis brlab /
T02TD2663A.2E:54a-13: de'i 'og tu sems kyis bdag gi bar gzung //
T02TD2663A.2E:54a-14: de'i 'og tu sngags kyis bsrung ba ste //
T02TD2663A.2E:54a-15: de gsum gyis yongs su gzung gi de las gzhan du ma yin zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:54a-16: srad bu rnam bzhi bshad de //
T02TD2663A.2E:54a-18: lnga pa nam mkha' lta bur bshad //
T02TD2663A.2E:54a-19: ces pa'i bar ni sngar tshon sna lnga'i srad bu zhes sbyir bshad pa de tshon sna lnga gang yin pa'i ming mos nas gsal bar bshad pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:54a-20: bar snang la ni bzung nas su //
T02TD2663A.2E:54a-21: der ni dkyil 'khor brtag par bya //
T02TD2663A.2E:54a-22: zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor snga ma la lte pa'i thad kar srad bu gzung zhes sbyir gsungs kyi /
T02TD2663A.2E:54a-23: der dkyil 'khor bri bar ma bshad pa de nyid bar snang la srang bu gzung /
T02TD2663A.2E:54a-24: bar snang der dkyil 'khor bri'o zhes gsal bar bshad pa yin no //
T02TD2663A.2E:54a-25: srang bu dag ni gnyis pa yis //
T02TD2663A.2E:54a-26: sa la dkyil 'khor dgod par bya //
T02TD2663A.2E:54a-27: zhes pa ni sngar srad bu gnyis pa blangs nas kha shar phyogs su blta zhes pa la sogs pa sbyir smos kyi /
T02TD2663A.2E:54a-28: dkyil 'khor nyid gang du bri ba zhi ba tu bshad pa de nyid gsal bar gsungs pa yin te /
T02TD2663A.2E:54a-29: bar snang la bris pa'i 'og tu srang bu gnyis pa blangs pa des sa la dkyil 'khor bri'o zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:54b-0: sangs @54b rgyas rnams ni thams cad dang //
T02TD2663A.2E:54b-1: de'i sras blo can rnams kyi gdan //
T02TD2663A.2E:54b-2: padma yid las byung ba'i mchog / bkra shis 'jig rten rnams kyis bsngags //
T02TD2663A.2E:54b-3: zhes pa ni gdan padma dkar pos bya'o zhes pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:54b-4: yid las byung ba'i mchog / ces pa ni sngar bzlas pa'i yan lag bzhi bshad pa'i tshe snying gar padma dkar po bsam par bshad la /
T02TD2663A.2E:54b-5: 'dir padma dkar po zhes bshad pas yid las byung ba'i padma smos pas ni yid kyis bsam pa'i padma dkar po de dang 'dra ba'i gang na bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:54b-6: rang rgyal dang ni dgra bcom pa //
T02TD2663A.2E:54b-7: phyogs gcig shes par gang grags pa //
T02TD2663A.2E:54b-8: de dag bstan shes bya ba //
T02TD2663A.2E:54b-10: zhes pa ni nyan thos dang sangs rgyas ye shes phyogs gcig pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi stan padma dkar po'i 'dab ma gcig steng du bya zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:54b-11: 'jig rten gyi ni lha rnams gang //
T02TD2663A.2E:54b-13: rgyal po rnams kyis rab bsngags pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:54b-14: zhes pa'i bar du 'jig rten gyi lha tshangs pa la sogs pa rgyal po'i gzugs can de dag 'dod chags dang bcas pa yin pas stan gyi padma dkar por bshad pa yin no //
T02TD2663A.2E:54b-15: phal pa rnams kyi ci rigs par //
T02TD2663A.2E:54b-16: sa yi bye brag dag las bsam //
T02TD2663A.2E:54b-17: zhes pa ni 'jig rten pa'i 'khor phal ba rnams bla ma'i drung na bla ma dang 'dra bar padma'i stan mi rigs pas de las dma' ba'i stan rnams gang rigs bya'o zhes pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:54b-18: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang 'jig rten pa'i lha rnams kyi stan 'dir bshad pa yang 'di rnams dkyil 'khor 'dir ma smos pas zhar la bshad par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:54b-19: dkyil 'khor bar ma la gshin rje la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi lha rnams smos pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku las sprul pa sha stag yin pas padma'i gdan nyid du rigs par bya'i 'jig rten pa phal pa rnams kyi ni ma yin no //
T02TD2663A.2E:54b-20: mchod pa rnam bzhir shes bya ste //
T02TD2663A.2E:54b-22: de las gzhan pa 'jig rten pa'i lha rnams la ni go rims bzhin zhes pa'i bar gyis mchod pa rnams bshad pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:54b-23: de la sbyir mchod pa rnams pa bzhi ste //
T02TD2663A.2E:54b-26: snying rje dang me tog dang bdug pa la sogs pa dang yid kyi mchod pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:55a-0: de la sngags pa zab cing @55a * //
T02TD2663A.2E:55a-1: rgya che ba la mos pa'i mchod pa 'di bzhi char spyod de yid kyi mchod pa yang byed /
T02TD2663A.2E:55a-2: phyi rol gyi mchod pa yang byed do //
T02TD2663A.2E:55a-3: dmigs pa can gyi sngags pas ni phyi rol gyi mchod pa rnams byed kyi /
T02TD2663A.2E:55a-4: ting nge 'dzin ni mi khug pas yid kyi mchod pa med do //
T02TD2663A.2E:55a-5: byams pa dang snying rje ni nan tan gyi mchod pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:55a-6: phyi dang nang gi mchod pa gang yang rung ba byas nas sems can rnams la byams pa dang snying rje bskyed nas mchod pa de dag nyid sems can rnams la bsngo bar byed pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:55a-7: de la phyi rol gyi mchod pa rnams ni sngar bshad zin to //
T02TD2663A.2E:55a-8: da ni 'dir yid kyi mchod pa bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:55a-10: me tog bdug spos 'jig rten pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:55a-11: sor mo las byung me tog rnams //
T02TD2663A.2E:55a-12: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:55a-13: sor mos las byung me tog rnams //
T02TD2663A.2E:55a-14: zhes pa ni thal mo sbyar ba las me tog 'byung ba de skyob pa kun la dbul bar bya zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:55a-16: yan lag kun 'byung phyag rgya ni //
T02TD2663A.2E:55a-17: bcings nas byang chub sems bsgoms te //
T02TD2663A.2E:55a-19: yid kyi mchod pa bya ba yang thog mar bdag gis phyag rgya'i bcings pas ji ltar bsams bzhin du sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mchod pa'i sprin 'byung bar shog shig ces smon lam btab nas stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas te byang chub kyi sems de mngon du bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:55a-20: de ltar ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa nyid na yang yid la nam mkha' mdzod kyi rig pa bzlas te /
T02TD2663A.2E:55a-21: de nas phyag rgya de las mchod pa rgya chen po 'og nas smos pa rnams char bzhin du 'bab par bsam mo //
T02TD2663A.2E:55a-22: de ltar bsams na chos kyi dbyings kyi byin rlabs ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang dang sngags kyi mthus de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi sbyan sngar char bzhin du 'bab par 'gyur te /
T02TD2663A.2E:55a-24: 'di ni skyon med me tog ste //
T02TD2663A.2E:55a-25: zhes pa la sogs pa rjes su bsdags pa dang bcas pa gsung so //
T02TD2663A.2E:55a-26: lha rnams phal ba gzhan la ni //
T02TD2663A.2E:55a-28: ji ltar rigs par rnam par bsam //
T02TD2663A.2E:55a-29: zhes pa'i bar gyis ni gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor tshon gyis bris pa'i lha rnams la phyi'i mchod pa me tog la sogs pa dbul ba'i rim pa bstan pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:55b-0: so so'i sngags kyis btab nas thog @55b mar bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la mchod de /
T02TD2663A.2E:55b-1: de nas padma'i rigs la sogs pa la mchod pa bya ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:55b-3: ji ltar rigs par rnam par bsam //
T02TD2663A.2E:55b-5: mthe bo srin lag sbyar ba ni //
T02TD2663A.2E:55b-7: de las gzhan pa 'jig rten pa'i //
T02TD2663A.2E:55b-8: lha rnams la ni go rims bzhin //
T02TD2663A.2E:55b-9: zhes pa'i bar gyis mchod pa rnams 'bul ba'i thabs bstan pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:55b-10: mthe bo srin lag sbyar ba ni //
T02TD2663A.2E:55b-11: zhes pa la sogs pas me tog dbul ba gsungs pa /
T02TD2663A.2E:55b-12: 'jig rten pa yi lha rnams la //
T02TD2663A.2E:55b-13: lte ba'i thad ka nas shes bya //
T02TD2663A.2E:55b-14: zhes pa 'jig rten pa'i 'dir gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams la bya ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:55b-15: de'i lha rnams la lte ba'i thad ka nas me tog dbul bar bya la /
T02TD2663A.2E:55b-16: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yid kyi dkyil 'khor rnams la ni snying ga nas dbul bar bshad pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:55b-17: bdug spos rdo rje'i khu tshur ram //
T02TD2663A.2E:55b-18: yang na padma'i phreng ba yis //
T02TD2663A.2E:55b-19: bar snang la ni bzung nas su //
T02TD2663A.2E:55b-20: 'jig rten mgon skyob rnams la dbul //
T02TD2663A.2E:55b-21: zhes pa ni bdug spos gsol ba na rdo rje lta bu'i khu tshur ram /
T02TD2663A.2E:55b-22: padma'i phyag rgya bcings pa ste //
T02TD2663A.2E:55b-23: pog phor ni rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung la kham por ni padma'i phyag rgyas bzung ste yid kyis dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams la bar snang la bstod de bzung nas gsol zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:55b-24: gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams la ni lte ba'i thad ka nas rim pa bzhin du gsol lo zhes pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:55b-26: de las gzhan pa 'jig rten pa'i lha rnams la ni go rims bzhin zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2663A.2E:55b-27: phyi dang nang gi bye brag gis //
T02TD2663A.2E:55b-28: sbyin sreg rnam pa gnyis shes bya //
T02TD2663A.2E:55b-30: sngags kyi shes pa spangs pa ste //
T02TD2663A.2E:55b-31: zhes pa'i bar gyis phyi nang gi sbyin sreg gnyis bshad pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:55b-32: de la phyi'i sbyin sreg ni bsreg par byas pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:55b-33: sreg pa'i me la sogs pa phyi'i dngos po gzugs la sogs pa la ltos pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:55b-34: nang gi sbyin sreg ni de rnams sems gnyis kyis byas te phyi rol gyi gzugs la sogs pa la ltos pa ma yin te /
T02TD2663A.2E:55b-36: las dang tshe las rnam par grol //
T02TD2663A.2E:56a-0: phung po dang khams dang skye mched la sogs @56a * //
T02TD2663A.2E:56a-1: pa'i chos rnams 'jig par byed pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyis stong par bshig ste las dang tshe la sogs pa dmigs su med par spros ba med pa'i shes rab kyis rtogs te yid la phung po la sogs pa dang sems dang sems las byung ba'i rgyu dang 'bras bu dag dmigs su med par gyur pa de la /
T02TD2663A.2E:56a-2: las dang tshe las rnam par grol //
T02TD2663A.2E:56a-4: de la sreg par byed pa ni spros pa med pa'i shes rab yin la las dang tshe la sogs pa ni bsreg par bya ba yin zhing sreg pa'i me ni rnam pa dang bral ba'i yid la bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:56a-5: slar yang sa bon 'byung ba ste //
T02TD2663A.2E:56a-6: zhes pa ni las dang tshe sreg pa'i mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas snying rje'i dbang gis lha'i gzugs su bya ba la bya ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:56a-7: bdag gi lha gang yin pa'i sngags kyi sa bon las lhar bsgyur ba'i rim pa ji skad gsungs pa'i tshul gyis bdag nyid kyi lha'i gzugs su bsgyur ba la bya ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:56a-8: de la dang po phung po la sogs pa 'jig pa'i byang chub kyi sems ni 'jug pa'i byang chub kyi sems so //
T02TD2663A.2E:56a-9: ji ltar 'jigs shing rtog pa de yang spangs te spros pa med pa'i shes rab rnam par mi rtog pa las dang tshe sreg par byed pa so so rang gi rig pa'i mtshan nyid ni gnas pa byang chub kyi sems so //
T02TD2663A.2E:56a-10: slar rang gi sa bon las lha'i gzugs su bsgyur ba ni ldang ba'i byang chub kyi sems so //
T02TD2663A.2E:56a-11: las dang 'dod pa'i sbyin sreg bya //
T02TD2663A.2E:56a-12: zhes pa ni zhi ba dang rgyas pa la sogs pa'i las rnams grub par 'dod pas phyi dang nang gi bya'o zhes pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:56a-13: mtshan mar bcas pas mtshan bcas kyis //
T02TD2663A.2E:56a-14: dngos grub rgyal ba dam pa bzhed //
T02TD2663A.2E:56a-15: mtshan ma med pa gnas pas ni //
T02TD2663A.2E:56a-16: mtshan ma can yang bsgrub tu rung //
T02TD2663A.2E:56a-17: zhes bya ba dang sbyar te /
T02TD2663A.2E:56a-18: nang gi sbyin sreg phyi rol gyi gzugs la sogs pa la mi ltos pa'i mtshan ma med pa des kyang shing la sogs pa mtshan ma dang bcas pa rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:56a-19: phyi rol gyi ni gsum ldan zhing //
T02TD2663A.2E:56b-0: zhes pa ni phyi rol gyi sbyin sreg byed pa na gsum dang ldan par bya ba ni zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang mngon spyod kyi las gang yang rung ba'i kha dog dang tshul du ldan par bya ba dang rdzas rnams kyang de'i kha @56b dog dang ldan par bsams pa dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:56b-1: bdag nyid kyang de'i kha dog dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i lhar bsgyur ba ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:56b-2: de ltar me dang rdzas dang bdag gsum po zhi ba la sogs pa'i las gang yang rung ba'i kha dog dang tshul du ldan par bya ba ni gsum dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:56b-3: gnas gsum dang zhes pa ni zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang mngon spyod rnams kyi dkyil 'khor dbang chen dang chu dang rlung gi gnas gsum dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:56b-4: gsum la gnas zhes pa ni zhi ba la sogs pa'i me thab zlum po dang gru bzhi dang gru gsum dag bsreg rdzas la sogs pa'i gnas yin no zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:56b-5: las gsum ni zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang mngon spyod rnams yin la /
T02TD2663A.2E:56b-6: lam grub pa ni de dag gi 'bras bu gsum grub pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:56b-7: phyi dang nang gang yang rung ba'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga de las gzhan du byas na de dag gis 'bras bu thob par mi 'gyur te /
T02TD2663A.2E:56b-9: gang dag gzhan du byed pa ni //
T02TD2663A.2E:56b-10: zhes pa la sogs pa ni gnyi ga'i spyir gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2663A.2E:56b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang sngags dang //
T02TD2663A.2E:56b-13: lha yi tshad kyang go rims bzhin //
T02TD2663A.2E:56b-14: de tsam du ni shes par bya //
T02TD2663A.2E:56b-15: zhes pa'i bar gyis ni sngags kyi lha la sogs pa'i kha dog dang dbyibs dang tshad rnams bshad de /
T02TD2663A.2E:56b-16: de bzhin gshegs pas gsang sngags dang //
T02TD2663A.2E:56b-17: de bzhin rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis gsungs //
T02TD2663A.2E:56b-18: dkar dang ser du shes par bya //
T02TD2663A.2E:56b-19: zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs ni chos thams cad rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid zhi ba'i rang bzhin yin pas na kha dog dkar por rig par bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:56b-20: de bzhin rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis gsungs //
T02TD2663A.2E:56b-21: zhes pa ni sh'akya thub pa dang 'phags pa 'jam dpal la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' kun du sangs rgyas pa de dag ni sems can gyi don la spyod pas na tshogs rdzogs par mdzad de rgyas pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas kha dog ser por rig par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:56b-22: phyag na rdo rje thams cad pa //
T02TD2663A.2E:56b-23: zhes pa ni phyag na rdo rje yang bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin sems can gyi don du spyod pas kha dog thams cad par rig par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:56b-24: 'jig rten dbang phyug gsang sngags ni //
T02TD2663A.2E:56b-25: las kyi bye brag dag las dkar //
T02TD2663A.2E:57a-0: zhes pa ni spyan ras gzigs kyi @57a * //
T02TD2663A.2E:57a-1: dbang po ni so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin chos thams cad 'khrul par byed pa'i bdag nyid pas kha dog dkar por shes par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:57a-2: kun du gru bzhi lham pa la //
T02TD2663A.2E:57a-3: go rims bzhin du zlum po dang //
T02TD2663A.2E:57a-4: gru gsum dang ni zla gam 'dra //
T02TD2663A.2E:57a-5: dbyibs ni legs par bshad pa yin //
T02TD2663A.2E:57a-6: zhes pa ni lha de rnams kyi 'khor dbang chen la sogs pa'i dbyibs bshad pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:57a-7: rim pa bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:57a-8: gzugs ni gnyis su shes bya ba //
T02TD2663A.2E:57a-9: bud med dang ni skyes pa nyid //
T02TD2663A.2E:57a-10: ces pa ni lha rnams kyi gzugs bshad pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:57a-11: de la lha rnams kyang rnam pa gsum ste rnam par smin pa'i gzugs dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:57a-12: gnas yongs su gyur pa dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:57a-14: de la rnam par smin pa'i gzugs ni rang gi las dang bsod nams las skyes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:57a-15: gnas yongs su gyur pa ni sgrub pa pos grub pa'i gzugs so //
T02TD2663A.2E:57a-16: sprul pa ni ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa'i dbang gis gang yang rung ba cig yid la bsams par gyur pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:57a-17: de dag las la la ni skyes par snang /
T02TD2663A.2E:57a-18: la la ni bud med du snang pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:57a-19: yang na kun du thams cad kyi //
T02TD2663A.2E:57a-20: kha dog dbyibs dang gzugs rnams te //
T02TD2663A.2E:57a-21: zhes pa ni yang na gong du kha dog dkar po la sogs smos pa dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:57a-22: dbyibs gru bzhi la sogs pa smos pa dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:57a-23: gzugs bud med dang skyes par smos pa de dag nges pa ni ma yin te de dag kun kyang kha dog thams cad dang dbyibs thams cad dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:57a-24: gzugs thams cad du shes par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:57a-26: bsam yas ye shes las byung bas //
T02TD2663A.2E:57a-27: de bas de rnams bsam yas te //
T02TD2663A.2E:57a-28: zhes gsungs te de thams cad kyang de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes bsam du med pa las byung ba sha stag yin pas kha dog dang dbyibs la sogs pa chad pa med pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:57a-29: de yang ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02TD2663A.2E:57a-30: ye shes mkhyen gyis ye shes ni //
T02TD2663A.2E:57a-31: sems can don phyir tha dad 'gyur //
T02TD2663A.2E:57b-0: de dag gi kha dog dang dbyibs la sogs pa chad pa med pa yang sems can gyi don sna tshogs la mkhas pa'i ye shes des gdul ba'i 'gro ba dang rjes su mthun pa'i gzugs la sogs pa ston pa'i phyir @57b ro //
T02TD2663A.2E:57b-1: yid kyi rgyan ni ji tsam pa //
T02TD2663A.2E:57b-2: stan dang phyag rgya dag dang ni //
T02TD2663A.2E:57b-3: lha yi tshad kyang go rims bzhin //
T02TD2663A.2E:57b-4: de tsam du ni shes par bya //
T02TD2663A.2E:57b-5: zhes pa ni lha la sogs pa'i tshang bsams te /
T02TD2663A.2E:57b-6: nang du yid la bsam pa'am /
T02TD2663A.2E:57b-7: phyi rol du bri ba la sogs pa kun kyang yid la ji tsam du 'dod pa de tsam du bsam pa'am bri bar bya zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:57b-8: lha yi tshad kyang go rims bzhin //
T02TD2663A.2E:57b-9: zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor du bri ba'i lha rnams kyang snying po'i dkyil 'khor du bri ba rnams ni dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i zheng che bas lha'i gzugs kyang che bar bya de'i go rims kyis de bzhin du zheng chung ba rnams su rim gyis chung bar bya zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:57b-10: sangs rgyas gang nas gang byung ba //
T02TD2663A.2E:57b-11: phyag rgya rnams kyang de nas byung //
T02TD2663A.2E:57b-12: zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya gang nas byung ba'i khungs bshad pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:57b-13: sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings las byung ba'i phyag rgya des bdag dang slob ma la sogs pa'i lha'i lus su byin gyis brlabs pa dang phyag rgya des slob ma la sogs pa srung ba ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:57b-14: de bsrungs na chos kyi dbyings kyi mtshan mas btab pas cis kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur ba ni 'jig rten na rgyal po'i rgya dang ldan pa'i skyes bu la sus kyang gtso bar mi 'gyur ba dang 'dra'o zhes sngar bzhin du bshad do //
T02TD2663A.2E:57b-15: de bas mdor na chos kyi dbyings //
T02TD2663A.2E:57b-16: mtshan ma phyag rgya yin par bshad //
T02TD2663A.2E:57b-17: ces pa ni mdor na phyag rgya rnams chos kyi dbyings kyi mtshan ma yin par shes par bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:57b-18: dbang bskur gsum du shes bya ste //
T02TD2663A.2E:57b-20: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsgrags //
T02TD2663A.2E:57b-21: zhes pa'i bar gyis ni dbang bskur ba rnam pa gsum bshad de //
T02TD2663A.2E:57b-22: phyag rgya gang zhig dbang bskur ba //
T02TD2663A.2E:57b-23: las dang bya ba spangs pa ste //
T02TD2663A.2E:57b-24: zhes pa ni snying rje chen po 'byung ba dang yi ge 'khor lo bskor ba'i dkyil 'khor du nam slob dpon dang slob ma zab cing rgya che ba la mos pa dag phyag rgyas dbang bskur bya bar bshad pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:58a-0: dkyil 'khor gnyis gang yang rung ba'i mdun du dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor dang bum pa la sogs pa la mi ltos par kun du bzang po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i phyag rgya dang 'og nas 'byung ba'i phyag @58a * //
T02TD2663A.2E:58a-2: las dang bya ba spangs pa ste //
T02TD2663A.2E:58a-3: zhes pa ni dbang bskur ba'i bum pa dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:58a-4: dkyil 'khor dang dung dang 'khor lo la sogs pa'i cho ga rnams dang bral ba zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:58a-5: gnyis pa las dang bya ba yis //
T02TD2663A.2E:58a-6: kun nas bslangs par yang dag bshad //
T02TD2663A.2E:58a-7: ces pa ni snying rje chen po dang 'byung ba dang yi ge 'khor lo bskor b'ai dkyil 'khor gyi mdun du dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor bris nas sngar ji skad bshad pa'i cho ga bzhin du dbang bskur bar gsungs pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:58a-8: gsum pa yid kyis shes bya ste //
T02TD2663A.2E:58a-9: yul dang dus tshod spangs pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:58a-10: zhes pa ni gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du yid kyis dbang bskur ba ste 'og nas dngos su 'byung ngo //
T02TD2663A.2E:58a-11: bla ma legs par mgu byas nas //
T02TD2663A.2E:58a-12: phan byed pas gang smras pa yi //
T02TD2663A.2E:58a-13: dbang bskur 'di ni mchog yin par //
T02TD2663A.2E:58a-14: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsgrags //
T02TD2663A.2E:58a-15: zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor gong ma gnyis su phyag rgyas dbang bskur nas rjes su gnang ba'i tshig smras pa la bya ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:58a-16: phyag rgyas dbang bskur ba'i 'og tu slob dpon slob ma'i rim gro dang nan tan la sogs pas mgu nas khyod kyis deng phyin tshad chos kyi 'khor lo bskor cig ces pa la sogs pa'i tshig tu shes par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:58a-17: phyag rgyas dbang bskur ba dang po dang dbang bskur ba gnyis pa ni snying rje chen po 'byung ba dang yi ge 'khor lo bskor ba'i dkyil 'khor du bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:58a-18: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du ni yid kyis dbang bskur ba dngos su gsungs pas gong ma gnyis mi bya bar shes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:58a-19: 'di rnams kyang 'dir tshig tsam bshad kyis don bsdus pa'i don nyid du gtan la phab ste bshad zin to //
T02TD2663A.2E:58a-20: sangs rgyas rnams kyis mdor na ni //
T02TD2663A.2E:58a-21: dam tshig can rnams sngar bshad de //
T02TD2663A.2E:58a-23: dam tshig can zhes gzhan mi bya //
T02TD2663A.2E:58a-24: zhes pa'i bar gyis ni dam tshig can gyi rim pa'i bshad pa yin te /
T02TD2663A.2E:58a-25: de la spyir slob ma rnams dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa yang kha cig ni dam tshig can du 'dod pa'i phyir 'jug la kha cig ni sgrub par byed pa'i phyir 'jug / kha cig ni slob dpon du 'dod pa'i phyir 'jug ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:58b-0: de la @58b dam tshig can du 'dod pa'i phyir 'jug pa ni /
T02TD2663A.2E:58b-1: dkyil 'khor 'di gsum las gang yang rung bar zhugs te dam tshig can du gyur na dkyil 'khor lhag ma gnyis la mi ltos la /
T02TD2663A.2E:58b-2: sgrub pa dang slob dpon du 'dod pa ni dkyil 'khor gsum char la ltos par shes par bya'o//
T02TD2663A.2E:58b-4: dam tshig shes pa gcig ces bya //
T02TD2663A.2E:58b-5: zhes pa ni dam tshig gi don ni 'dir tshul las mi 'gal ba'i don te dkyil 'khor gsum las gang yang rung ba zhig mthong na dam tshig can gcig ces bya ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:58b-6: des sngar byang chub kyi sems bsgoms na ni de la phyag rgya dang sngags sbyin par bya la /
T02TD2663A.2E:58b-7: sngar byang chub kyi sems ma bsgoms na de la phyag rgya dang sngags sbyin du mi rung ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:58b-9: de la phyag rgya mi bstan zhing //
T02TD2663A.2E:58b-10: sngags kyang sbyin par mi bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:58b-12: de ltar dkyil 'khor der zhugs nas phyag rgya dang sngags mi sbyin par byang chub kyi sems bsgoms du bcug ste goms par gyur na /
T02TD2663A.2E:58b-13: byang chub sems kyi bye brag las //
T02TD2663A.2E:58b-14: sngags dang phyag rgya yongs su gzung //
T02TD2663A.2E:58b-15: zhes bya bas gdod phyag rgya dang sngags sbyin par gsungs so //
T02TD2663A.2E:58b-17: dam tshig can gnyis shes par bya //
T02TD2663A.2E:58b-18: zhes pa ni de ltar byang chub kyi sems goms nas yang dkyil 'khor du bcug ste phyag rgya dang sngags byin pa de ni dam tshig can gnyis par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:58b-19: dkyil 'khor dang ni phyag rgya mthong //
T02TD2663A.2E:58b-20: las dang bya ba la yang sbyar //
T02TD2663A.2E:58b-21: bla mas lung ni ma byin par //
T02TD2663A.2E:58b-22: de yang dam tshig shes par bshad //
T02TD2663A.2E:58b-23: ces pa ni dkyil 'khor kyang mthong la //
T02TD2663A.2E:58b-24: rgyud dang rtog pa la sogs pa nyan du bcug cing slob dpon du lung ma bstan pa de ni dam tshig shes pa gsum pa zhes bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:58b-25: phyag rgya dkyil 'khor bri ba rnams //
T02TD2663A.2E:58b-26: de tshe cho ga bzhin du bstan //
T02TD2663A.2E:58b-27: gsang ba'i ye shes byung ba yis //
T02TD2663A.2E:58b-28: dbang bskur med pa'i sngags pa'ang yin //
T02TD2663A.2E:58b-29: zhes pa ni snying rje chen po 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khro dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:58b-30: yi ge 'khor lo bskor ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis ka dbang bskur ba'am /
T02TD2663A.2E:59a-0: gang yang rung ba cig tu dbang bskur te phyag rgya dang dkyil 'khor bri ba dang phyag rgya bshad pa de dag @59a * //
T02TD2663A.2E:59a-1: tshog bzhin du des gzhan la yang bstan par gsungs pa las gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'ba' zhig tu dbang ma bskur ba de ni dam tshig shes pa bzhin zhes bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:59a-2: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni //
T02TD2663A.2E:59a-3: sngags pa cho gas dbang bskur ba //
T02TD2663A.2E:59a-4: dam tshig shes pa lngar shes bya //
T02TD2663A.2E:59a-5: dam tshig can zhes gzhan mi bya //
T02TD2663A.2E:59a-6: zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor gong ma gnyis su yang dbang bskur la //
T02TD2663A.2E:59a-7: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba de ni dam tshig gshegs pa lnga zhes bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:59a-8: dam tshig can zhes gzhan mi bya //
T02TD2663A.2E:59a-9: de ltar gong du smos pa las gzhan du cho ga las 'gal bar byas na dam tshig can zhes mi bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:59a-10: brtul zhugs bzang po byang chub phyir //
T02TD2663A.2E:59a-12: gnas pa de ni bden pa mthong //
T02TD2663A.2E:59a-13: zhes pa'i bar gyis gong du ni //
T02TD2663A.2E:59a-14: sngags spyad pa la brtson pa yi //
T02TD2663A.2E:59a-15: sngags pa byang chub sems dpa' dang //
T02TD2663A.2E:59a-16: thams cad mkhyen par ji ltar 'gyur //
T02TD2663A.2E:59a-17: ji ltar bden pa mthong bar 'gyur //
T02TD2663A.2E:59a-18: zhes pa ni dris pa de dag bshad pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:59a-19: brtul zhugs bzang po byang chub phyir //
T02TD2663A.2E:59a-20: gang zhig sems ni bsgom pa na //
T02TD2663A.2E:59a-21: sngags pa'i gnas gsum mi dmigs pa //
T02TD2663A.2E:59a-22: de ni byang chub sems dpa' yin //
T02TD2663A.2E:59a-23: zhes pa ni gang zhig byang chub kyi sems rtag tu bsgoms te /
T02TD2663A.2E:59a-24: lus dang ngag dang yid kyi gnas gsum mam /
T02TD2663A.2E:59a-25: 'dod pa'i khams dang gzugs kyi khams dang gzugs med pa'i khams kyi gnas gsum du 'jug pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyis bshig ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:59a-26: dmigs su med par byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i zhes bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:59a-27: thabs kyi snying stobs skyes nas su //
T02TD2663A.2E:59a-28: sems can don la sbyor ba ni //
T02TD2663A.2E:59a-29: dmigs su med pa'i spyod pa thob //
T02TD2663A.2E:59a-30: rgyal ba'i mchog tu shes par bya //
T02TD2663A.2E:59a-31: zhes pa ni dmigs su med pa'i spyod pa thob nas de las langs te chos rnams sgyu ma lta bur shes pa bzhin du thabs kyis sems can gyi don du spyod pa de ni thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:59a-32: dmigs su med pa'i spyod thob ba //
T02TD2663A.2E:59b-0: zhes pa ni mos pas spyod pa'i tshe na 'jug pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi chos rnams bshig nas gnas pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gnas pa na don dam par yang chos rnams dmigs @59b su med la /
T02TD2663A.2E:59b-1: kun rdzob tu yang chos rnams 'khrul pa'am sgyu ma lta bur rtogs pas na /
T02TD2663A.2E:59b-2: dmigs su med pa'i spyod pa thob pa /
T02TD2663A.2E:59b-4: rgyal ba'i mchog ces pa ni de ltar kun rdzob dang don dam par chos rnams dmigs su med par rtogs pa de ni bdud bzhi dngo su bcom yang bdud bzhi las rgyal ba'i dang tshul can yin pas rgyal ba'i mchog ces bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:59b-5: thog ma nas ni zhi ba'i chos ngo bo nyid med pa la /
T02TD2663A.2E:59b-6: gang gi sems ni rang bzhin gyis //
T02TD2663A.2E:59b-7: gnas pa de ni bden pa mthong //
T02TD2663A.2E:59b-8: zhes pa ni bden pa mthong ba bshad pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:59b-9: de nas chos rnams thog ma nas zhi zhing gang gi ngo bo nyid med par rtogs te de nyid la sems ri rab bzhin du mi g-yo bar 'gyur na de ni bden pa mthong ba zhes bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:59b-10: de dag kyang mdor na thog ma ni 'jug pa'i byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:59b-11: bden pa mthong ba zhes pa ni gnas pa'i byang chub kyi sems bshad pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:59b-12: rgyal pa'i mchog ces pa ni ldang ba'i byang chub kyi sems bstan pa ste de dag kyang mos pas spyod ba'i sa gnyis la gnas pa'i yon tan du shes par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:59b-15: sangs rgyas nyid dang gang gzhan no //
T02TD2663A.2E:59b-16: zhes ba'i bar gyis grub pa'i rigs rnams bshad pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:59b-18: de bzhin du ni mi slu ba //
T02TD2663A.2E:59b-19: ji ltar sangs rgyas bden gzigs pa //
T02TD2663A.2E:59b-20: de bzhin sngon ni ngas ma mthong //
T02TD2663A.2E:59b-22: 'di ni byang chub sems thob pa //
T02TD2663A.2E:59b-23: zhes pa ni de nyid kyi rjes su bsngags pa'i khyad par te /
T02TD2663A.2E:59b-24: gang yang byang chub kyi sems thob pa de ni bden zhing yang dag pa mi slu ba ste ji ltar sngon gyi sangs rgyas dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:59b-25: ngas kyang yang dag mis slu ba yin par mthong ngo zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:59b-26: gang gis byang chub kyi sems thob pa yang bsgrubs nas /
T02TD2663A.2E:59b-27: de srid du byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po'am /
T02TD2663A.2E:59b-29: rdo rje 'dzin chen po gang yang rung ba cig 'ongs te mgo la nyug gam legs so zhes zer gyi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:60a-0: de nas phyag byas te mchod yon phul na byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro zhes gong du bshad pa de lta bu'i grub pa thob pa ni byang chub kyi sems @60a * //
T02TD2663A.2E:60a-2: de lta bu grub pa na de nyid dngos grub yin gyis /
T02TD2663A.2E:60a-3: gzhan ci zhig dgos te byang chub kyi sems de grub pa gzhan gyi rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2663A.2E:60a-4: de las gzhan du'ang dngos grub ni //
T02TD2663A.2E:60a-5: rnam pa dag ni lngar 'dod de //
T02TD2663A.2E:60a-6: zhes pa ni byang chub kyi sems grub pa de las gzhan pa ming gis smos pa lnga po la bya ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:60a-7: de dag kyang spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa la sogs pa rnams so //
T02TD2663A.2E:60a-8: de la spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa ni mos pas spyod pa'i sa las 'phar te ye shes kyis la 'jug pa'i skabs su snang ba thob pa dang snang ba mched pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par grub pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:60a-9: de bzhin sa ni gnon pa dang //
T02TD2663A.2E:60a-10: zhes pa nis rab tu dga' ba thob pa las grub pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:60a-12: zhes pa ni 'jig rten gyi mngon par shes pa lnga grub pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:60a-13: sangs rgyas nyid dang zhes pa ni sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su gyur pa'i rig 'dzin grub pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:60a-14: gang zhan zhes pa ni rig 'dzin pa la rnams grub pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:60a-15: de nyid kyi gzungs kyi grub pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:60a-16: gong ma gsum ni sems kyi grub par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:60a-17: rgyud las rgyud du gyur pa yi //
T02TD2663A.2E:60a-19: yid las yang dag 'byung ba thob //
T02TD2663A.2E:60a-20: ces pa'i bar gyis grub pa'i dus bshad de /
T02TD2663A.2E:60a-21: de las grub pa'i dus kyang tshe 'di la grub pa dang tshe phyi ma la grub pa rnam pa gnyis so //
T02TD2663A.2E:60a-22: rgyud las rgyud du gyur pa yi //
T02TD2663A.2E:60a-23: las ni mi srid pa nyams shing //
T02TD2663A.2E:60a-24: rnam smin rnam par ma smin te //
T02TD2663A.2E:60a-25: dngos grub dag gis dus su 'dod //
T02TD2663A.2E:60a-26: ces pa ni tshe 'di la grub pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:60a-27: rgyud las rgyud du gyur pa'i las rnams ma zad de tshe snga ma'i rgyud go drug la sogs pa nas las bsags pa tshe 'di'i rgyud la ma nyams shing bdag gi phung po gson na zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:60a-28: rnam smin rnam par smin pa de //
T02TD2663A.2E:60a-29: zhes ston la de ltar yang gson la tshe dang bsod nams la sogs pa'i rgyud bsags pa'i 'bras bu yang 'dir smin par gyur cing snga ma'i las rnams ma zad pas bdag tshe ring ba'i rnam smin rnam par smin pas bdag gi bsod nams kyi rgyud mthu brtas bar gyur te /
T02TD2663A.2E:60a-30: sgrub pa'i tshe de ltar tshe dang bsod nams gnyis bsrungs na de tshe 'di nyid la grub par bshad do //
T02TD2663A.2E:60b-0: mdor na @60b gang tshe dus gcig tu //
T02TD2663A.2E:60b-1: las dang skye ba 'phang gyur pa //
T02TD2663A.2E:60b-2: de tshe 'ang sngags pas dngos grub ni //
T02TD2663A.2E:60b-3: yid las yang dag 'byung ba thob //
T02TD2663A.2E:60b-4: ces pa ni dngos grub bsgrub pa ni las dang tshes ma btang ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:60b-5: dus gcig tu las dang tshe zad par gyur na sgrub pa'i 'bras bu sngags pa des tshe phyi ma la bsgrub mi dgos par rdo rje la sogs pa'i rigs su skye pa dang rig 'dzin la sogs pa'i skye ba thob par 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:60b-6: yid las yang dag 'byung ba yis //
T02TD2663A.2E:60b-7: zhes pa ni rdzas la sogs pas bsgrub mi dgos par tshe 'phos ma thag tu yid nyid kyis grub pa de dag thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2663A.2E:60b-8: grub nas mkha' la 'gro ba ni //
T02TD2663A.2E:60b-10: rdzogs sangs rgyas dang lhan cig dga' //
T02TD2663A.2E:60b-11: zhes pa'i bar gyis ni grub pa'i 'bras bu rnams dris pa'i lan bshad pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:60b-12: grub nas nam mkha' la 'gro ba ni /
T02TD2663A.2E:60b-13: ji ltar sgyu ma 'jigs med bzhin //
T02TD2663A.2E:60b-14: sngags kyi dra bas rmongs byed pa //
T02TD2663A.2E:60b-15: ji ltar mig 'phrul chen po bzhin //
T02TD2663A.2E:60b-16: zhes pa ni nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i grub pa bshad pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:60b-17: ji ltar mig 'phrul gzhan nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs byed ba bzhin du sngags pa de yang rig 'dzin la sogs pa grub nas nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang sngags kyi mthus rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i sprul pa la sogs par ston par byed ces pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:60b-18: gang la lus dang ngag med par //
T02TD2663A.2E:60b-19: dri za'i grong khyer de bzhin te //
T02TD2663A.2E:60b-20: de bzhin mi snang 'gyur zhes bya //
T02TD2663A.2E:60b-21: de ni de na gnas pa yin //
T02TD2663A.2E:60b-22: zhes pa ni rig 'dzin la sogs pa grub nas mi snang bar gyur pa'i dpe dri za'i grong khyer las blangs nas bshad pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:60b-23: ji ltar dri za'i grong khyer lus la sogs pa dang dngos su mi snang la gnas par byed pa de bzhin du /
T02TD2663A.2E:60b-24: sngags pa de yang grub nas lus kyang mi snang la tshig tu brjod pa yang mi thos par nam mkha' la mi snang bar gyur cing bar snang la gnas par byed do zhes bshad do //
T02TD2663A.2E:60b-25: ji ltar nyal ba'i rmi lam na //
T02TD2663A.2E:60b-26: sum cu rtsa gsum gnas su ni //
T02TD2663A.2E:60b-27: lus kyang spangs pa ma yin la //
T02TD2663A.2E:60b-28: de nyid kyis kyang de ma song //
T02TD2663A.2E:60b-29: de bzhin rnal 'byor gnyid kyis kyang //
T02TD2663A.2E:60b-30: sngags pa sngags la gnas pa dang //
T02TD2663A.2E:60b-31: bsod nams byas pa'i las rnams kyis //
T02TD2663A.2E:61a-2: ces pa ni sngags pa rig 'dzin la sogs pa grub nas lus 'di yang mi 'dor bar nam mkha' la sogs pa la 'gro ba'i dpe rmi lam las blangs nas bshad pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:61a-3: ji ltar skyes bu nyal ba'i rmi lam na sum cu rtsa gsum la sogs pa'i gnas mthong bar yang 'gyur ba de bzhin du //
T02TD2663A.2E:61a-4: sngags pa de yang rnal 'byor gyi dbang gis lus 'di ni ma bor bar nam mkha' la sogs par 'gro ba yang rang gis mthong ngo //
T02TD2663A.2E:61a-5: gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs yang ston nus par 'gyur zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:61a-7: ces pa ni gzugs sna tshogs ston pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:61a-8: lus dang ngag yid las byung ba'i //
T02TD2663A.2E:61a-9: gsang sngags yid bzhin nor bu 'dra //
T02TD2663A.2E:61a-10: de las rnam par bsams pa'i don //
T02TD2663A.2E:61a-12: zhes pa ni sngags kyi grub pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu las dpe blangs nas bshad ba ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:61a-13: ji ltar yid bzhin gyi nor bu gang bsams pa'i don rnams brtags mi dgos par lhun gyis grub pa nyid du 'byor bar gyur pa de bzhin du sngags grub pa'i 'bras bu yang gang 'dod pa rnams brtags mi dgos par lhun gyis grub pa nyid du 'byor par 'gyur zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:61a-14: ji ltar nam mkha' phyogs rnams su //
T02TD2663A.2E:61a-15: 'dus byas spyod yul thams cad kyis //
T02TD2663A.2E:61a-16: mi gos de bzhin sngags pa yang //
T02TD2663A.2E:61a-17: rtogs pa'i spyod yul kun gyis so //
T02TD2663A.2E:61a-18: zhes pa ni grub pa thob pa de yang ni gza' dang skar ma dang ltas ngan la sogs pas mi tshugs par bshad pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:61a-19: ji ltar nam mkha' la 'dus byas la sogs pa'i dri mas mi gos pa de bzhin du grub pa'i sngags pa de yang gza' dang skar ma la sogs pa bzang ngan la mi ltos te /
T02TD2663A.2E:61a-20: de dag gis ltas ngan la sogs pas mi tshugs par shes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:61a-22: nam zhig de ltar bsgoms gyur cing //
T02TD2663A.2E:61a-23: rnam par bsgoms na sngags pa de //
T02TD2663A.2E:61a-24: rdzogs sangs rgyas dang lhan cig dga' //
T02TD2663A.2E:61a-25: zhes pa ni sngags pa grub pa thob nas sangs rgyas dang lhan cig tu 'grogs pa thob par bshad pa de /
T02TD2663A.2E:61b-0: zhes pa 'dus byas la sogs pa'i @61b chos 'di dag thams cad dngos su spong ba ma yin gyi //
T02TD2663A.2E:61b-1: 'du shes tsam du byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa'i tshe bsgoms pas kun du sangs rgyas pa dang lhan cig tu 'grogs shing de la chos nyan pa la sogs pas dga' bar 'gyur zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:61b-2: sangs rgyas rkang gnyis gtso bo yis //
T02TD2663A.2E:61b-3: sbyin sreg gnyis su bshad pa ni //
T02TD2663A.2E:61b-4: phyi rol gyi dang nang gi ste //
T02TD2663A.2E:61b-5: de yang tshim par bya dang bcas //
T02TD2663A.2E:61b-6: zhes ba ni sbyin sreg las me dag dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:61b-7: zhes sngar dris pa la rnam pa gnyis ni sngar bshad zin la /
T02TD2663A.2E:61b-8: 'dir ni sbyin sreg rnam pa gnyis phyi ma'i me dang nang gi me rnam pa gnyis su bshad de /
T02TD2663A.2E:61b-9: de yang tshim par bya ba bcas //
T02TD2663A.2E:61b-10: zhes gsungs pa de la nang gi sems kyi tshim par bya ba ni rang gi sa bon las slar lha'i gzugs su bsgyur bar sngar bshad do //
T02TD2663A.2E:61b-11: phyi rol gyi me ni mnyes par bya ba'i bsreg pa'i rdzas kyis tshim par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:61b-12: lha rnams kyis ni so so yis //
T02TD2663A.2E:61b-14: yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis //
T02TD2663A.2E:61b-15: gsang sngags 'bras bu skal ba ldan //
T02TD2663A.2E:61b-16: zhes pa'i bar gyis lha rnams kyi rang bzhin dang grub tshad rnams bshad pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:61b-17: lha rnams kyang ni so so yis //
T02TD2663A.2E:61b-18: rang bzhin yongs su mkhyen nas su //
T02TD2663A.2E:61b-19: zhes pa ni lha rnams kyi rang bzhin shes par byas na de dag gi grub pa'i 'bras bu yang shes par 'gyur zhes pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:61b-20: de la 'jig rten las 'das ba'i lha rnams kyi rang bzhin ni sngar bshad zin to //
T02TD2663A.2E:61b-21: 'dir ni 'jig rten gyi lha rnams kyi rang bzhin bshad nas de'i mthus 'bras bu'i tshad shes par bya ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:61b-23: 'jig rten pa yi sngags rnams kyi //
T02TD2663A.2E:61b-24: tshad dag legs par gsungs pa ni //
T02TD2663A.2E:61b-25: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2663A.2E:61b-26: dbang phyug la sogs pa'i lha mthu chen po de dag gis smras pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya rnams ni 'bras bu 'phral du ster pa ni de dag gi tshad bstan pa yin no //
T02TD2663A.2E:61b-27: tshad ces pa ni de dag gi mthu la bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:61b-29: chos can de dag brtan pa med //
T02TD2663A.2E:61b-30: ces pa ni de dag gi khyad par gsungs pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:61b-31: 'jig rten pa'i lha rnams 'bras bu tshe 'di la 'phral du ster mod kyi /
T02TD2663A.2E:61b-32: de rnams skye zhing 'jig pa'i chos can yin pas mi rtag pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:62a-3: gsang sngags tshad ni sngon bshad pa //
T02TD2663A.2E:62a-4: zhes pa'i bar gyis 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sngags te /
T02TD2663A.2E:62a-5: byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas la sogs pas gsungs pas sngags rnams thog ma'i byed pa med cing las dang skye ba bcad pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:62a-6: 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug gi nyes pa gsum dang bral bas skye zhing 'jig pa la sogs pa med de tshad rnams sngar bshad zin to zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:62a-7: dus gsum las ni shin tu 'das //
T02TD2663A.2E:62a-8: rten cing 'brel pa las byung ba //
T02TD2663A.2E:62a-9: mthong dang ma mthong 'bras bu can //
T02TD2663A.2E:62a-10: dag gi lus las byung ba'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:62a-11: zhes pa ni de lta bas na 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sngags rnams 'jig rten pa ltar mthong ba'i chos 'ba' zhig la 'bras bu 'phral du ster ba kho na ma yin gyi /
T02TD2663A.2E:62a-12: mthong ba'i chos dang ma mthong ba gnyi ga la 'bras bu ster ro zhes pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:62a-13: mthong ba ni lha dang mi la sogs pa 'grub ba'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:62a-14: ma mthong ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:62a-16: bskal ba gcig tu bshad pa yin //
T02TD2663A.2E:62a-17: zhes gsungs pa ni 'jig rten pa'i lha rnams kyi grub pa'i 'bras bu ji srid thub pa gsungs pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:62a-18: 'jig rten pa'i 'bras bu ni bskal ba gcig gi bar du thub ces pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:62a-19: yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis //
T02TD2663A.2E:62a-21: zhes pa ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sngags rnams kyi 'bras bu bskal ba las 'das par thub ces pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:62a-22: sangs rgyas drang srong chen po dang //
T02TD2663A.2E:62a-23: rgyal sras rnams kyi ting 'dzin ni //
T02TD2663A.2E:62a-24: mtshan ma med cing dag pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:62a-25: 'jig rten par ni mtshan mar bcas //
T02TD2663A.2E:62a-26: zhes pa ni sngags pa rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin bshad pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:62a-27: de la spyir ting nge 'dzin la yang rnam pa gnyis te /
T02TD2663A.2E:62a-28: don dam pa dang kun rdzob kyi'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:62a-29: de la don dam pa ni aa la sogs pa yi ge 'bru re'i sgo nas bstan pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:62a-30: kun rdzob kyi ni stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i yon tan gyi tshig tu gyur pa de dag gi sngags kyi phreng ba'i tshig las ting nge 'dzin gyur pa'i yi ge rnams te sngar bshad zin to //
T02TD2663A.2E:62a-31: 'dir ni ting nge 'dzin gyi don rnams bshad ba ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:62b-0: sangs rgyas drang @62b srong chen po ni //
T02TD2663A.2E:62b-1: lus dang ngag dang yid gsum thub pa'i mtshan nyid can yin pas drang srong ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:62b-2: mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa kun du sangs rgyas pa la sogs pa la bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:62b-3: rgyal sras rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:62b-4: de dag gi ting nge 'dzin gyi chos thams cad gzod ma nas ma skyes pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i mtshan nyid can yin pas mtshan ma med pas dag pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:62b-5: 'jig rten par ni mtshan mar bcas //
T02TD2663A.2E:62b-6: zhes pa ni nam byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par brgyan pa la sogs pa rnam pa dang bcas pa'i spyod pa dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:62b-7: 'jug pa dang sangs rgyas shing mngon par byang chub nas sngon gyi smon lam gyi shugs kyis sku mi zad pa'i 'khor lo la sogs pa 'byung ba ya mtshan dang bcas pa'i spyod pa ste de dag la yang 'jig rten pa mtshan ma dang bcas zhes bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:62b-8: gnyis su na mu stegs byed kyi 'jig rten pa'i lha rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin ni dngos po yod par lta bas na mtshan ma dang bcas zhes bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:62b-9: rnam par smin pa 'di nyid la //
T02TD2663A.2E:62b-10: las kyi 'bras bu smin gyur pa //
T02TD2663A.2E:62b-11: nam zhig dngos grub thob pa na //
T02TD2663A.2E:62b-12: de tshe las dang zlog par 'gyur //
T02TD2663A.2E:62b-13: zhes pa ni sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa'i phung po lnga po 'di la lha'i gzugs su smin par 'gyur ba'i las kyi 'bras bu smin par 'gyur te /
T02TD2663A.2E:62b-14: nam bdag gi ting nge 'dzin la sogs grub pa thob pa ni de'i tshe grub pa de las kyi rnam par smin pas de zil gyis mnan nas 'bras bu mi smin par ldog par 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:62b-15: sems ni ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir //
T02TD2663A.2E:62b-16: rgyu dang 'bras bu rnams spangs shing //
T02TD2663A.2E:62b-17: las dang tshe las rnam par grol //
T02TD2663A.2E:62b-18: nam mkha' lta bur gyur pa yin //
T02TD2663A.2E:62b-19: zhes pa ni grub pa'i mthar sangs rgyas su 'gyur par bstan te /
T02TD2663A.2E:62b-20: sgrub pa pos byang chub kyi sems dag par bsgom pas sems kyi ngo bo nyid med par rtogs te /
T02TD2663A.2E:62b-21: chos kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu dmigs su med pas rgyu las dang 'bras bu che ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:62b-22: las dang tshe dag las kyang rnam par grol bar 'gyur te /
T02TD2663A.2E:63a-0: de ltar las dang tshe las rnam par grol na nam mkha' lta bur gzung ba dang 'dzin pa spangs pa dag pa'i @63a * //
T02TD2663A.2E:63a-1: mtshan nyid du 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:63a-2: gsang ba'i bdag po zhes pa nas //
T02TD2663A.2E:63a-3: snying rje chen po'i 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod kyi de bri ba'i cho ga nyon cig ces pa'i bar gyis gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin dang yon tan brjod nas nyon cig ces pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:63a-4: de la phyag rgya'i gzugs su dgod ba'i rim par phye ba zhes pa ni snying rje chen po 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor dang yi ge 'khor lo bskor ba'i dkyil 'khor du lus dang tshig gis gzugs su bkod kyi /
T02TD2663A.2E:63a-5: 'dir sems kyi rang bzhin dngos su gzhag tu mi rung pas phyag rgya'i gzugs su bkod pa de /
T02TD2663A.2E:63a-6: de'i rim par phye ba ni phyag rgya'i gzugs su bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor la bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:63a-7: lha rnams gnas par byin gyis rlob pa zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor der lha rnams phyag rgya'i gzugs su bkod bas byin gyis rlob par gyur pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:63a-8: ting nge 'dzin lnga rtogs pa zhes pa ni dbang chen la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor lnga po de dag nyid ye shes kyi bye brag tu byin gyis brlabs pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:63a-9: dkyil 'khor lnga po de las ye shes kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par lnga rtogs par 'gyur pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:63a-10: sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas ba zhes pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad mdzad pa gcig tu bstan pa ni /
T02TD2663A.2E:63a-11: sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang mkhyen nas bshad kyis de nyon cig ces sbyar ro //
T02TD2663A.2E:63a-12: byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas zhes pa nas /
T02TD2663A.2E:63a-13: phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir zhes pa'i bar du ni dkyil 'khor de bshad pa yang phyag na rdo rjes mi mkhyen pa'i phyir bshad pa ni ma yin gyi /
T02TD2663A.2E:63a-14: mos pas spyod pa'i sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir bshad do zhes pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:63a-15: chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa spyod yul du gyur pa zhes pa ni mos pas spyod pa'i sa la gnas pa rnams kyi shes rab kyi yon tan bshad pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:63a-16: de dag shi shes rab ni nam mkha' dang 'dra ba'i chos kyi dbyings dmigs pa'i spyod yul du 'gyur zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:63a-17: chos kyi dbyings nam mkha' dang 'dra ba de dag gi spyod yul du gyur na sngags kyi tshul bshad ci dgos she na /
T02TD2663A.2E:63b-0: de dag de ltar @63b stong ba nyid kyi spyod yul can du gyur kyang thabs kyis sems can bsgral bar byed do //
T02TD2663A.2E:63b-1: de bas na sems can gyi khams ma lus pa bsgral ba yi dam bcas pa zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2663A.2E:63b-2: de ltar thabs dang shes rab zung du 'brel ba'i sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir dkyil 'khor de nyon cig ces pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:63b-3: de la don dang zhes pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don mya ngan las 'das pa'am /
T02TD2663A.2E:63b-4: nges par legs pa'i bde ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD2663A.2E:63b-5: phan pa dang bde pa'i zhes pa ni tshe 'di dang phyi ma la phan pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2663A.2E:63b-6: bde ba'i phyir zhes pa ni tshe 'di la bya ba'i phyir zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:63b-7: gsang ba pa'i bdag po dang por yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor dgod pa zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor snga ma dag dang 'dra bar dang po snying po'i dkyil 'khor du bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dgod pa zhes pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:63b-8: bri ba'i cho ga nyon cig ces 'og nas 'byung ba dang sbyar ro //
T02TD2663A.2E:63b-9: gsang ba las kyang ches gsang ba //
T02TD2663A.2E:63b-10: zhes pa la gsang ba ni sems kyi rang bzhin phra zhing dmigs su med pas na gsang ba'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:63b-11: de las kyang ches gsang ba ni dam tshig med pa'i sems can rnams la mi bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2663A.2E:63b-12: snying rje chen po'i snying po 'byung ba zhes pa ni sngar bzhin no //
T02TD2663A.2E:63b-13: gad las 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor grangs med pa 'byung ba zhes pa la 'jig rten pa'i dkyil 'khor ni gzugs brnyen gyi dkyil 'khor te tshon gyis bri ba rnams so //
T02TD2663A.2E:63b-14: 'jig rten las 'das pa ni rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor te gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor rnams kyang 'di las 'phro ba dang rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor yang 'di mthong ba las shes par gyur pas na 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ba zhes bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:63b-15: yang na 'jig rten pa'i lha rnams kyi dkyil 'khor dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha rnams kyi dkyil 'khor grangs med pa rnams kyang 'di las 'byung ba zhes pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:63b-16: de bri ba'i cho ga nyon cig ces pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:63b-17: kun du grub bzhi lha ma pa la //
T02TD2663A.2E:63b-19: dgod pa rnams kyang nges pa yin //
T02TD2663A.2E:64a-1: las byung bar shes par bya //
T02TD2663A.2E:64a-2: zhes pa'i bar gyis bcom ldan 'das rnam par snad mdzad bzhugs pa'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor bri ba ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:64a-5: tshon dgye ba la sogs ba'i cho ga rnams dkyil 'khor gong ma rnams su ji skad gsungs pa bzhin no //
T02TD2663A.2E:64a-6: kun du gru bzhi lham pa ni tshad med pa bzhi dang ldan par ston pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:64a-7: sgo gcig pa ni sgo mang po nas chos kyi dbyings kyi sgo gcig tu 'du bar bstan pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:64a-8: stegs bur bcas pa ni mtha' tshon gyis bris pa'i dbus tshon ser pos bkang ste bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa'i gzhir bcas zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:64a-9: rdo rje rnams kyi mtshan pa ni de'i nang nub phyogs kyi logs su rdo rje rtse lnga pa bri ba'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:64a-10: dbus su rdo rje rtse brgyad pa //
T02TD2663A.2E:64a-11: zhes pa ni rgyu'i tshe rnam par grol ba'i gzungs ye shes brgya dang bcas par ston to //
T02TD2663A.2E:64a-12: rnam par grol ba'i sgor gyur pa ye shes brgyar yang yi ge 'khor lo bskor ba'i rim par phye ba las yi ge aa sa mgo btsugs nas ka'i rim nas ya dang ra dang ba dang la yan chad kyi bar du yi ge nyi shu rtsa bzhi smos pa dang dang po'i yi ge aa dang bcas pa nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:64a-13: de bzhin du a'a dang bcas pa de yang nyi shu rtsa lnga aom dang bcas pa nyi shu rtsa lnga /
T02TD2663A.2E:64a-14: aa: dang bcas pa yang nyi shu rtsa lnga ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:64a-15: de ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo brgya las ye shes brgyar sbyar ba'i rang bzhin rdo rje rtse brgyad pa de'i dbus su bri'o zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:64a-16: sha dang sha dang sa dang ha rnams ni cha gnyis pa'i nang du 'dus par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:64a-17: de'i steng padma bri ba ni //
T02TD2663A.2E:64a-18: sa bon dang bcas rgyas par byas //
T02TD2663A.2E:64a-19: zhes pa ni rdo rje de'i steng du padma 'dab ma bzhi ba rang gi sa bon dang bcas par bri'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:64a-20: de steng du yang padma che /
T02TD2663A.2E:64a-21: phyag rgya kla dkor gyis mdzes byas //
T02TD2663A.2E:64a-22: 'dab ma brgyad pa legs par rdzogs //
T02TD2663A.2E:64a-23: ze bar bcas pa shin tu bzang //
T02TD2663A.2E:64a-24: zhes pa ni padmo de'i steng du yang padma chen po 'dab ma brgyad pa bris te /
T02TD2663A.2E:64a-25: phyag rgya klad kor gyis mdzes byas //
T02TD2663A.2E:64a-26: zhes pa klad kor ni stong pa nyid du ston pa'i tshig yin pas yan lag bcu gnyis pa'i rig pa'i rgyal po la bya ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:64a-27: yan lag bcu gnyis tshig dgod pa //
T02TD2663A.2E:64b-0: phyag rgya ni @64b gsang ba'i phyag rgya brgyad pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:64b-3: padma steng mche ba dang 'dab ma brgyad kyis bye brag che bas 'og de bas chung bar bya bar mngon te 'dab ma bzhi bar shes par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:64b-4: gnyis su rgyu'i tshe padma yin pas chung bar shes par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:64b-5: padma chen po 'dab ma brgyad pa ni ye shes brgyad kyi rang bzhin du sngar bshad pa bzhin no //
T02TD2663A.2E:64b-6: 'dab ma rnams ni thams cad la //
T02TD2663A.2E:64b-7: yan lag bcu gnyis tshig dgod pa //
T02TD2663A.2E:64b-8: zhes pa ni yan lag bcu gnyis pa'i rig pa'i rgyal mo'i snying po dang nye ba'i snying por bcas pa'i yi ge zung brgyad po rnams 'dab ma brgyad la bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:64b-9: de rnams dbus na mgon bzhugs pa //
T02TD2663A.2E:64b-10: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis gtso //
T02TD2663A.2E:64b-12: khor khor yug yongs bskor ba //
T02TD2663A.2E:64b-13: zhes pa ni padma'i dbus kyi snying po la bcom ldan 'das bzhugs te /
T02TD2663A.2E:64b-14: phyag rgya brgyad po rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi khor khor yug tu rang gi dkyil 'khor dang sa bon du bcas par padma'i snying po de nyid la bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:64b-16: mchog tu shes par bya ba ste //
T02TD2663A.2E:64b-18: mchog ni ston pa'i mchog go //
T02TD2663A.2E:64b-19: snying rje las byung zhes pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2663A.2E:64b-20: lung bzhin dkyil 'khor rnams dang ni //
T02TD2663A.2E:64b-21: las dang lus dang dngos grub dang //
T02TD2663A.2E:64b-22: dgod pa rnams kyang nges pa yis //
T02TD2663A.2E:64b-23: 'di las byung bar shes par bya //
T02TD2663A.2E:64b-24: zhes pa ni zhi ba dang rgyas pa la sogs pa'i las rnams kyi dkyil 'khor lugs gzugs su dgongs la /
T02TD2663A.2E:64b-25: dkyil 'khor gyi sngags kyi lung gzhan dag las bshad pa rnams kyang dkyil 'khor 'di las byung bar shes par bya ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:64b-26: de ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi gnas dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor du shes par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:64b-27: gsang ba ba'i bdag po gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dkyil 'khor ni zhes pa nas /
T02TD2663A.2E:64b-28: de ni phyogs bcu rnams su song //
T02TD2663A.2E:64b-29: zhes pa'i bar gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi shar phyogs su sngar 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor bri ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:65a-0: @65a * // ces pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan padma'i kha dog zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar dkar po zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:65a-1: dung lta bu yi dbus na ni //
T02TD2663A.2E:65a-2: zhes pa chu'i dkyil 'khor kha dog dung dang 'dra bar shes par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:65a-3: sangs rgyas kun gyi gru gsum pa //
T02TD2663A.2E:65a-4: padma dkar po'i steng na gnas //
T02TD2663A.2E:65a-5: zhes pa ni chu'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na phyag rgya gru gsum padma dkar po'i steng gnas pa bri'o zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:65a-6: klad kor bcas pa'i mtshan gyis btab //
T02TD2663A.2E:65a-7: ces pa ni der yi ge aa klad kor dang bcas par gzhag ces pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:65a-8: rdo rje'i mtshan mas mtshan pa ste //
T02TD2663A.2E:65a-9: zhes pa ni der rdo rje rtse lnga pa bris zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:65a-10: dpyad mi dgos par kun nas ni //
T02TD2663A.2E:65a-11: 'od zer dag ni gnyis bya ba //
T02TD2663A.2E:65a-12: gsang sngags mgon las byung bas su //
T02TD2663A.2E:65a-13: de ni phyogs bcu rnams su song //
T02TD2663A.2E:65a-14: zhes pa ni phyag rgya gsum pa de'i gra gnyis nas 'od gnyis byung bar bri ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:65a-15: de yang chos kyi sku las longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa'i sku 'byung bar shes par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:65a-16: gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang /
T02TD2663A.2E:65a-17: spyan ras gzigs dbang dkyil 'khor ni //
T02TD2663A.2E:65a-19: rig sngags rgyal dang bcas par ni //
T02TD2663A.2E:65a-20: mkhas pas rnam par dgod par bya //
T02TD2663A.2E:65a-21: zhes pa'i bar gyis spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i dkyil 'khor bshad pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:65a-22: kun du gru bzhi lham pa la //
T02TD2663A.2E:65a-23: zhes pa dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor du bri ba'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:65a-24: dbus su dung 'dra gzhag par bya //
T02TD2663A.2E:65a-25: zhes pa ni de'i dbus su chu'i dkyil 'khor bri ba'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:65a-26: de yi steng du padma ni //
T02TD2663A.2E:65a-27: sa bon bcas byas rgyas par bri //
T02TD2663A.2E:65a-28: zhes pa ni chu'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du padma dkar po sa bon aa dang bcas pa bri'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:65a-29: de yi steng du 'ang rdo rje che //
T02TD2663A.2E:65a-30: zhes pa ni padmo'i steng du rdo rje rtse lnga pa gzhag ces pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:65a-31: rdo rje las kyang padma che //
T02TD2663A.2E:65a-32: thams cad sa bon rnams kyis mtshan //
T02TD2663A.2E:65a-33: rang gi sa bon legs par sbyar //
T02TD2663A.2E:65a-34: zhes pa ni rdo rje de'i steng du chen po 'dab ma brgyad pa bri ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:65a-35: rang gi sa bon dang bcas pa bri zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:65a-36: sgrol ma dang ni khro gnyer can //
T02TD2663A.2E:65a-38: khyad par du ni bri bar bya //
T02TD2663A.2E:65b-0: zhes pa'i bar gyis sgrol ma la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams dkyil 'khor der phyag rgya'i gzugs su bris zhes @65b pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:65b-1: rta mgrin can gyi bya ba ni //
T02TD2663A.2E:65b-3: mkhas pas rnam par dgod par bya //
T02TD2663A.2E:65b-4: zhes pa'i bar ni dkyil 'khor de'i nub phyogs kyi mtha' mar rta mgrin can gyi dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa bri ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:65b-5: dkyil 'khor mchan ma bzang pos btab //
T02TD2663A.2E:65b-6: ces pa ni gru gsum pa dkyil 'khor gyi mtshan pa zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:65b-8: zhes pa dkyil 'khor de'i kha dog nyi ma dang 'dra ba'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:65b-9: rig sngags rgyal dang bcas par ni //
T02TD2663A.2E:65b-10: mkhas pas rnam par dgod par bya //
T02TD2663A.2E:65b-11: zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor gru gsum po de rig pa'i rgyal po rta mgrin dang bcas par bri ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:65b-12: de'i phyag rgya'i gzugs su bri bar shes par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:65b-13: gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang khyod kyi dkyil 'khor mdor bshad par bya'o zhes pa nas /
T02TD2663A.2E:65b-14: rgyal ba'i gtso bo rnams kyis gsungs //
T02TD2663A.2E:65b-15: zhes pa'i bar gyis phyag na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bshad pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:65b-16: phyag na rdo rje ni bya ba sgrub pa'i rang bzhin las thams cad pa yin pas dkyil 'khor bzhi char dang ldan par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:65b-17: kun du gru bzhi lham pa la //
T02TD2663A.2E:65b-18: rdo rje'i mtshan ma rnams kyis mtshan //
T02TD2663A.2E:65b-19: thams cad ser po yid du 'ong //
T02TD2663A.2E:65b-20: zhes pa ni dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor dang por bri ba ste snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2663A.2E:65b-21: dbus na padma rab tu gnas //
T02TD2663A.2E:65b-22: de yi dbus su bya ba ni //
T02TD2663A.2E:65b-24: zhes pa ni dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su padma bris te /
T02TD2663A.2E:65b-25: padma'i steng du chu'i dkyil 'khor bri'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:65b-26: bum pa ni chu'i dkyil 'khor du shes par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:65b-27: 'di ni mtshan ma rnams kyis mtshan //
T02TD2663A.2E:65b-28: kla dkor gyis kyang rnam par brgyan //
T02TD2663A.2E:65b-29: zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor de rang gi sa bon yi ge ba kla dkor dang bcas pa'i mtshan mas mtshan pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:65b-30: de'i steng du yang rlung chen ni //
T02TD2663A.2E:65b-31: dbyar gyi char sprin 'dra ba'i mdog / ba dan g-yo ba sngags pas bya //
T02TD2663A.2E:65b-32: klad kor gyis kyang rnam par brgyan //
T02TD2663A.2E:65b-33: zhes pa ni chu'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du rlung gi dkyil 'khor kha dog smug nag dbyar gyi char sprin dang 'dra ba g-yo bzhin pa'i ba dan dang bcas pa bri ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:65b-34: klad kor gyis kyang rnam par brgyan //
T02TD2663A.2E:66a-0: zhes pa ni rang gi sa bon yi ge klad kor dang bcas par shes par @66a * //
T02TD2663A.2E:66a-2: de'i steng du yang gru gsum pa //
T02TD2663A.2E:66a-3: rab tu 'jigs pa'i gzugs can te //
T02TD2663A.2E:66a-5: sum mdo'i ris mtshan mtshan gyis btab //
T02TD2663A.2E:66a-6: ces pa ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor de'i steng du me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa 'jig pa'i bskal ba'i me'i kha dog 'dra ba 'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug pa zhes pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:66a-7: sum mdo'i rigs mtshan mtshan gyis btab pa ni dkyil 'khor de'i mtshan ma gru gsum pas kyang btab pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:66a-10: zhes pa ni 'bar pa'i phreng ba kha dog nyi ma 'char ba dang 'dra ba 'jigs pas 'khor bar bya zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:66a-11: de yi dbus su padma che //
T02TD2663A.2E:66a-12: zhes pa ni me'i dkyil 'khor de'i dbus padma kha dog dus mtha'i me 'od 'dra ba dmar po gnyis 'dri zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:66a-13: padma'i steng du rdo rje ni //
T02TD2663A.2E:66a-15: zhes pa ni padma'i steng du rdo rje kha dog dmar smug tu bri ste 'bar ba ni me'i kha dog yin la /
T02TD2663A.2E:66a-16: 'phro ba ni rlung gi shas te /
T02TD2663A.2E:66a-17: me dang rlung gnyi ga'i shas yod pas rdo rje dmar smug tu bri ste 'bar ba ni rdo rje me'i kha dog yin la /
T02TD2663A.2E:66a-18: h'um zhes bya ba'i sgra dang ldan //
T02TD2663A.2E:66a-19: dam pa sa bon rnams kyis mtshan //
T02TD2663A.2E:66a-20: zhes pa ni de'i steng du phyag na rdo rje'i sa bon gyi yi ge h'um gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:66a-22: rgyal ba'i gtso bo rnams kyis gsungs //
T02TD2663A.2E:66a-23: zhes pa ni sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams kyis kyang gsungs zhes pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:66a-24: dpa' bo zhes pa ni phyag na rdo rje la bod pa'o//
T02TD2663A.2E:66a-25: m'a ma k'i dang lu gu rgyud //
T02TD2663A.2E:66a-27: de dag ji ltar rig par bya //
T02TD2663A.2E:66a-28: zhes pa'i bar gyi m'a ma k'i la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams kyang dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang du bri bar bshad pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:66a-30: kha dog khyad par go rims bzhin //
T02TD2663A.2E:66a-31: de dag ji ltar rig par bya //
T02TD2663A.2E:66a-32: zhes pa ni so so'i phyag rgya'i dang sa bon rnams so so'i kha dog ci 'dra pa las /
T02TD2663A.2E:66a-33: dkyil 'khor kyang de bzhin du shes par bya ste //
T02TD2663A.2E:66a-34: sngar bshad pa'i rim pa bzhin du bri zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:66a-35: de nas gzhan yang rdo rje 'dzin //
T02TD2663A.2E:66b-0: rnam par rgyal @66b dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:66b-1: zhes pa'i bar gyis phyag na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'og logs su nam mkha' dri ma med pa la sogs pa'i rdo rje 'dzin ming gis smos pa bcu gnyis po rnams bris te de rnams kyi dkyil 'khor yang dbang chen la sogs bzhi po bri ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:66b-2: de rnams dkyil 'khor bshad pa ni //
T02TD2663A.2E:66b-3: dkar po ser po dmar po dang //
T02TD2663A.2E:66b-4: nag po yin par yang dag bsgrags //
T02TD2663A.2E:66b-5: zhes pa rdo rje 'dzin bcu gnyis po rnams la dkyil 'khor bzhi po 'di lan gsum du bsgres te rim pa bzhin du sbyar ro //
T02TD2663A.2E:66b-6: de nas gzhan yang phyag rgya'i gzugs //
T02TD2663A.2E:66b-7: rtse gsum pa dang rtse gcig dang //
T02TD2663A.2E:66b-8: gzhan yang gnyis dang gnyis ma yin //
T02TD2663A.2E:66b-9: phreng ba lta bu'i de bzhin gzhan //
T02TD2663A.2E:66b-10: kha dog bye brag las shes bya //
T02TD2663A.2E:66b-11: zhes pa de rnams kyi phyag mtshan rdo rje rtse gsum pa la yang rnam pa gnyis te /
T02TD2663A.2E:66b-12: phyogs gcig rtse gsum pa dang //
T02TD2663A.2E:66b-13: phyogs gnyis ka rtse gsum pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:66b-14: de bzhin du rtse gcig pa yang shes par bya ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:66b-15: de bas na kha gnyis pa yang gzung ba'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:66b-16: gnyis ka ma yin pa ni rdo rje tho lum du shes par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:66b-17: phreng ba lta bu'i de bzhin gzhan //
T02TD2663A.2E:66b-18: zhes pa ni rdo rje phreng ba'i phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:66b-19: phyag rgya drug po de dag lan gnyis su bsgres pas bcu gnyis po la khya ba pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:66b-20: kha dog bye brag las shes bya //
T02TD2663A.2E:66b-21: zhes pa ni phyag rgya de rnams kyi kha dog dag kyang rdo rje 'dzin pa de dag nyid kyi kha dog ji lta ba bzhin du'o zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:66b-22: 'di rnams kun kyang mthu chen te //
T02TD2663A.2E:66b-23: rnam par rgyal dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:66b-24: zhes pa ni rdo rje 'dzin pa de dag gi rjes su bsngags pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:66b-25: gdul dka' ba rnams las rnam par rgyal ba dang ldan no zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:66b-26: mi g-yo mgon gyi dkyil 'khor ni //
T02TD2663A.2E:66b-28: blo ldan de yis bri bar bya //
T02TD2663A.2E:66b-29: zhes pa'i bar gyis 'phags pa mi g-yo ba'i dkyil 'khor bshad pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:66b-30: rlung dang me yi yin par 'dong //
T02TD2663A.2E:66b-31: ces pa ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi steng du me'i dkyil 'khor bris nas de'i steng du 'phags pa mi g-yo ba'i phyag rgya ral gri 'am zhags pa gang yang rung ba cig rang gi sa bon dang bcas par bri'o zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:66b-32: 'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal gyi 'da //
T02TD2663A.2E:66b-33: bye brag tu ni rlung gi dbus //
T02TD2663A.2E:67a-1: pa'ang zhes pa'i tshig gis 'phags pa mi g-yo ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi steng du me'i dkyil 'khor gyi bri zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:67a-2: rlung gi dbus zhes pa ni me'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du rlung gi dkyil 'khor bris te /
T02TD2663A.2E:67a-3: de'i dbus su rdo rje'i phyag rgya rang gi mtshan ma dang bcas par bri zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:67a-5: zhes pa ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor gnyis dang me'i dkyil 'khor gcig ste gsum la 'dug ces pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:67a-6: gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang zhes pa nas /
T02TD2663A.2E:67a-7: mdor nas bon dang ldan par bya /
T02TD2663A.2E:67a-8: zhes pa'i par gyis nam mkha'i spyan gyi dkyil 'khor bshad pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:67a-9: dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2663A.2E:67a-10: lha mo de'i kha dog kyang ser por bya ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:67a-12: der yang gtsug tor gzhag pa ni //
T02TD2663A.2E:67a-13: cha gsum la ni gnas par bya //
T02TD2663A.2E:67a-14: zhes pa ni dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor gyi steng du padma bri ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:67a-15: padma'i steng du gtsug tor cha gsum dang ldan pa bri'o zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:67a-16: dbu ma'i cha ni bor nas ni //
T02TD2663A.2E:67a-17: de yang sbyan ni bri bar bya //
T02TD2663A.2E:67a-18: zhes pa ni gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya de'i smad sum gnyis bor la stod kyi sum cha'i nang du spyan gyi phyag rgya bri'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:67a-20: zhes pa ni gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya de 'od 'bar ba'i dbus na gnas par bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:67a-21: mdor nas bon dang ldan par bya //
T02TD2663A.2E:67a-22: zhes pa ni yum de'i sa bon gyi yi ge dang bcas par bya zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:67a-23: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis //
T02TD2663A.2E:67a-25: re ba thams cad rdzogs byed pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:67a-26: zhes pa'i bar ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi phyag rgya yid bzhin gyi nor bu ni chu'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bris zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:67a-27: de nas sh'akya seng ges yang //
T02TD2663A.2E:67a-29: go rims bzhin du gzhag par bya //
T02TD2663A.2E:67a-30: zhes pa'i bar ni dkyil 'khor gyi snam bu gnyis pa la sh'akya thub pa dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa bri ste gzhan ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2663A.2E:67a-31: dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor gyi steng du padma ser po bzhag ste padma'i steng du lhung bzed dam /
T02TD2663A.2E:67a-33: 'khar gsil gsum las gang yang rung ba gzhag ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:67b-0: de yang @67b 'bar ba dang bcas pa'i rdo rjes mtshan par bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:67b-1: gtsug tor lnga po gang bsgrags pa //
T02TD2663A.2E:67b-3: kha dog bye brag las shes bya //
T02TD2663A.2E:67b-4: zhes bya ba'i gtsug tor lnga po rnams kyi phyag rgya bri bar bshad pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:67b-5: de dag gi dkyil 'khor ni so so'i kha dog ci 'dra ba dang sbyar bar bya ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:67b-6: kha dog kyang dkyil 'khor snga mar bshad zin to //
T02TD2663A.2E:67b-7: mdzod spu'i yid bzhin nor bu bzhin //
T02TD2663A.2E:67b-8: zhes pa ni mdzod spu'i phyag rgya yid bzhin gyi nor bu bri zhes pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:67b-9: dkyil 'khor yang de nyid kyi kha dog ci 'dra ba dang sbyar ro //
T02TD2663A.2E:67b-10: spyan gyi yang ni 'di nyon cig / gtsug tor thams cad ser po ste //
T02TD2663A.2E:67b-11: rdo rje'i mtshan mas mtshan par bya //
T02TD2663A.2E:67b-12: zhes pa ni sangs rgyas spyan gyi phyag rgya gtsug tor ser po bris te /
T02TD2663A.2E:67b-13: rdo rje'i mtshan ma dang bcas pa bri'o zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:67b-14: de'i kha dog ser po yin pas dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor du bri bar shes par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:67b-15: gzhan gyis mi thub ma yi ni //
T02TD2663A.2E:67b-16: lag pa ngo mtshar padma can //
T02TD2663A.2E:67b-17: zhes pa ni lha mo gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i phyag rgya lag pa khu tshur bcangs pa 'dra ba padma'o thogs par bri'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:67b-18: gzhan gyis mi thub ces bya ba'i //
T02TD2663A.2E:67b-19: kha chen padma gnag la gnas //
T02TD2663A.2E:67b-20: zhes pa ni gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal mo'i phyag rgya padma nag po'i steng na gnas pa bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:67b-21: gtsang mar gnas pa gang grags pa //
T02TD2663A.2E:67b-23: cho ga rgyas par bri bar bya //
T02TD2663A.2E:67b-24: zhes pa'i bar gyis gnas gtsang ma rnams kyi phyag rgya bri bar bshad pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:67b-25: sems pa'i lag pa ni thal mo 'gram pa la brten pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:67b-26: dkyil 'khor du bri ba na 'gram pa mi bri bar thal mo 'ba' zhig gyen du shor du 'dug pa bri'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:67b-27: dge ba'i lag ni mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i lag pa bri'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:67b-28: 'dzum pa'i lag pa ni kha 'gram nas 'dren pa lta bu bri'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:67b-29: lag na me tog ni srin lag dang mthe bong gnyis sprad pa bri'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:67b-30: nam mkha'i lag pa ni lag pa bsgreng bar bri'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:67b-31: sa yi lha mo'i bum pa ste //
T02TD2663A.2E:67b-32: chu yi dkyil 'khor rdo rjes mtshan //
T02TD2663A.2E:67b-33: zhes pa ni sa bdag gi phyag rgya bum pa chus gang ba rdo rjes brgyan par bri zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:67b-34: gnyer pa'i lag pa me yi ste //
T02TD2663A.2E:67b-35: drang srong rnams dang bcas par bri //
T02TD2663A.2E:68a-1: 'od srungs zhes pa la sogs pa'i drang srong ming gis smos pa rnams dang lhan cig tu bris pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:68a-2: rig byed lag pa zhes pa ni smrang 'don pa'i lag pa ltar mthe bo sor mo'i tshigs su 'bog pa ni drang srong rnams kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:68a-3: gshin rje'i be con bri ba ni //
T02TD2663A.2E:68a-4: rlung gi dkyil 'khor nang na 'dug / ces pa ni gshin rje'i be con rlung gi dkyil 'khor du 'dug pa bri zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:68a-5: 'chi bdag gi ni dril bu yin //
T02TD2663A.2E:68a-7: ji ltar rigs par bri bar bya //
T02TD2663A.2E:68a-8: zhes pa'i bar gyis gshin rje'i 'khor 'chi bdag dang dus mtshan mo la sogs pa ming gi smos pa rnams kyi phyag rgya rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi nang du tha ma bya rog dang bya rgod la sogs pas bskor bar bri'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:68a-9: bden bral gyi ni ral gri bri //
T02TD2663A.2E:68a-11: chu lha yin par shes par bya //
T02TD2663A.2E:68a-12: zhes pa'i bar du khya ba 'jug la sogs pa ming gis smos pa rnams kyi phyag rgya yang ji skad smos pa bzhin du bri bar bshad do //
T02TD2663A.2E:68a-13: de dag la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor dngos su ma smos pa rnams kyang so so'i kha dog dang gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor yang sngar bshad pa dang sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:68a-14: gzhan yang mchog sbyin rdo rje yi //
T02TD2663A.2E:68a-16: autpal rnams kyi khebs par bya //
T02TD2663A.2E:68a-17: zhes pa'i bar gyis dkyil 'khor gyi snam bu gsum pa la 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi dkyil 'khor bri bar bshad pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:68a-18: kun du gru bzhi lham pa la //
T02TD2663A.2E:68a-19: rdo rje'i mtshan mas mtshan pa ste //
T02TD2663A.2E:68a-20: zhes pa ni dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor de snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2663A.2E:68a-21: de yi dbus su bya ba ni //
T02TD2663A.2E:68a-23: zhes pa ni dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor de'i dbus su me'i dkyil 'khor bri'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:68a-24: de'i dbus phyag rgya bzhag pa ni //
T02TD2663A.2E:68a-25: autpal zhes bya gzugs bzang ba //
T02TD2663A.2E:68a-26: zhes pa ni me'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su phyag rgya autpal 'dzin pa autpal'i kha dog nyid du bri'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:68a-27: 'jam dbyangs blo dang ldan pa yis //
T02TD2663A.2E:68a-28: rang gi sngags kyis gzi bskyed pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:68a-29: zhes pa ni autpal de'i steng du 'jam dbyangs nyid kyi sngags kyi sa bon bzhag ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:68a-30: gzengs bstod par bya zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:68a-31: de yi gnas ni cho ga bzhin //
T02TD2663A.2E:68b-0: rang gi @68b sa bon nyid kyis btab //
T02TD2663A.2E:68b-1: ces pa ni dbang chen dang me'i dkyil 'khor la so so'i sa bon aa dang ra cho ga bzhin du gzhag ces pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:68b-2: mtha' ma kho ra khor yug tu //
T02TD2663A.2E:68b-3: autpal rnams kyis khebs par bya //
T02TD2663A.2E:68b-4: zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor de'i mtha' autpa las bskor bar bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:68b-5: de yi dbus su bri ba ni //
T02TD2663A.2E:68b-7: autpa la kham bye bar zhes pa'i bar du dra ba can gyi 'od la sogs pa'i phyag rgya ji skad smos pa bzhin du bri zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:68b-8: 'jam dbyangs blo dang ldan pa yi //
T02TD2663A.2E:68b-9: mngag gzhug mar ni gang grags pa //
T02TD2663A.2E:68b-11: de dag thams cad autpa la'i //
T02TD2663A.2E:68b-12: mtshan ma dag gis mtshan par bya //
T02TD2663A.2E:68b-13: zhes pa'i bar ni skra can ma la sogs pa'i mngag gzhug ma rnams kyi phyag rgya ji skad du smos pa rnams la autpa la'i mtshan mas btab ste bri'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:68b-14: ji skad gsungs pa'i phyag brnyan ma //
T02TD2663A.2E:68b-15: de dag phyag rgya khadga ri //
T02TD2663A.2E:68b-16: zhes pa ni 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi phyag brnyan ma sngar ji skad du bshad pa rnams kyi phyag rgya khadga ri zhes bya ba gri gug 'dra ba rnams bri'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:68b-17: lho yi phyogs su nan tan du //
T02TD2663A.2E:68b-18: sgrib pa rnams sel brtson 'grus che'i //
T02TD2663A.2E:68b-19: zhes pa nas de dag thams cad kyang padma la gnas shing dkyil 'khor gyi nang du chud par bya'o zhes pa'i bar ni sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba 'khor dang bcas pa'i phyag rgya ji skad du smos pa rnams bri bar gsungs pa ste lag pa snying gar gzhag pa ni lag pa 'ba' zhig gzhag pa 'dra bar bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:68b-20: de dag thams cad kyang padma la gnas shing dkyil 'khor gyi nang du chud par bya'o zhes pa ni 'phags pa 'jam dpal dra ba can gyi 'od man chad dkyil 'khor dngos sum smos pa thams cad dkyil 'khor gong ma'i nang du padmo'i steng du bri'o zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:68b-21: byang phyogs su sa'i snying po'i phyag rgya ni //
T02TD2663A.2E:68b-23: phyag rgya'i gzugs su 'dir bshad do //
T02TD2663A.2E:68b-24: zhes pa'i bar ni sa'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor bshad pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:68b-25: dbang chen dkyil 'khor nang gnas pa //
T02TD2663A.2E:68b-26: zhes pa ni dbang chen ni snga ma bzhin la /
T02TD2663A.2E:69a-0: stan ni snga ma bzhin du gzhag / ces pa ni dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor de'i dbus su stan snying rje chen po 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor du @69a * //
T02TD2663A.2E:69a-1: bshad pa bzhin du bri zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:69a-2: de'i sting padma chen po ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:69a-3: kha dog kun ldan 'bar bar bcas //
T02TD2663A.2E:69a-4: zhes pa ni gdan de'i steng du padma 'dab ma brgyad pa bri ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:69a-5: kha dog kun ldan ni dkar po ser po dmar po sngon po dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:69a-6: kha dog de rnams las gzhan du sbyar ba ljang gu la sogs pa gsum dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:69a-7: brgyad de padma 'dab ma brgyad pa kha dog sna tshogs rnams su bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:69a-8: de'i steng ba dan chen po ste //
T02TD2663A.2E:69a-9: rtse la rin chen chen po gzhag / ces pa ni padma'i steng du ba dan gyi rtse la rin po che gzhag pa bri zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:69a-10: de yi gzugs kyi mchog yin te //
T02TD2663A.2E:69a-11: phyag rgya'i gzugs su 'dir bshad do //
T02TD2663A.2E:69a-12: zhes pa ni sa'i snying po de'i gzugs phyag rgya'i gzugs su bshad pa yin zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:69a-13: de yi 'khor ni grangs med pa //
T02TD2663A.2E:69a-14: gtso bo yon tan mtha' yas te //
T02TD2663A.2E:69a-15: zhes pa nas phyag rgya thams cad kyang dkyil 'khor gyi nang du chud par bya'o zhes pa'i bar ni sa'i snying po'i 'khor mtha' yas shing /
T02TD2663A.2E:69a-16: grangs med pa rnams kyi phyag rgya bri bar bshad pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:69a-17: sa 'dzin gyis ni rdo rje kha gnyis pa rin po che'i steng ni 'dug pa'o zhes pa ni rdo rje'i ya thog ma thog gnyis ka rtse mo can zhes pa ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:69a-18: de ltar rdo rje de bye brag tu che bas na rdo rje gong ma gnyis bo phyogs re re na rtse gsum pa dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:69a-19: rtse gcig par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:69a-20: phyag rgya thams cad kyang dkyil 'khor gyi nang du chud par bya'o zhes pa ni phyag rgya de dag thams cad kyang dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang du chud par bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:69a-21: nub phyogs su nam mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgya ni zhes pa nas rim par phye ba rgyas pa'i bar ni nub phyogs su nam mkha'i snying bo 'khor dang bcas pa'i phyag rgya ji skad smos pa'i rnam par bri bar shes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:69a-22: de la dkyil 'khor 'dir lha rnams kyi kha dog dang dbyibs gsal bar ma gsungs pa rnams ni dkyil 'khor gong ma gnyis su bshad pa'i kha dog dang dbyings su blta bar bshad par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:69b-0: dkyil 'khor gong ma dag tu kha dog la sogs pa zhib tu ma bshad pa yang dkyil 'khor 'og ma 'dir lha so so'i dkyil 'khor ji skad bshad pa las de rnams kyi kha @69b dog kyang de bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:69b-1: rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa byin gyis rlob pa las /
T02TD2663A.2E:69b-2: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba rgyas pa'o /
T02TD2663A.2E:69b-4: // / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i cho ga gsungs pa zhes pa nas /
T02TD2663A.2E:69b-5: dam tshig ces ni gzhan mi bya //
T02TD2663A.2E:69b-6: zhes pa'i bar gyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du bcug nas dbang bskur ba'i cho ga bshad de /
T02TD2663A.2E:69b-7: dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i rim pa lda de nub mo lhag par gnas shing sdom pa bzung ba la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:69b-8: dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i tshe bsrung zhing chus bsang gtor bya ba dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:69b-9: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa la sogs pa dkyil 'khor snga mar bshad pa sbyin no //
T02TD2663A.2E:69b-10: khyad par du ni dkyil 'khor gyi sgo khyud kyi nang du slob ma snga ma bzhin du gzhag ste slob dpon yang snga ma bzhin du rang gi ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas slob ma'i snying gar yi ge ra bsams te yi ge de'i sgra'i de kho na nyid chos thams cad rdul dang bral ba la dmigs nas slob ma de'i lus rdul phran la sogs par bshig ste rdul phran de dag kyang mi dmigs par byas pas yi ge ra'i sgra las slob ma'i lus don dam par stong par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:69b-11: de ltar bsams nas yi ge ra'i me des slob ma'i lus bsregs te thal bar gyur par bsam mo //
T02TD2663A.2E:69b-12: de ltar stong par gyur pa dang /
T02TD2663A.2E:69b-13: de'i gnas su slar yang yi ge aa bsams te /
T02TD2663A.2E:69b-14: aa las bcom ldan 'das kyi skur gyur bar bsam mo zhes pa ni 'dus pa'i don to //
T02TD2663A.2E:69b-15: yan lag gi don yang bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2663A.2E:69b-16: kun du bslabs pa'i sngags pa ni //
T02TD2663A.2E:69b-17: zhes pa slob dpon snying rje chen po 'byung ba dang yi ge 'khor lo bskor ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis po bri ba dang dbang bskur ba dang bzlas pa dang bsgrub pa la sogs pa'i cho ga bslabs te lo bas par gyur pas mkhas pa zhes bya'o //
T02TD2663A.2E:69b-18: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor la mkhas pas //
